<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
aggregate intrinsic value of options outstanding and exercisable at April&nbsp;30, 2008 was $43,240 and $39,940, respectively. The total intrinsic value of options exercised was
$3,281 and $33,705 and $8,500 in 2008, 2007 and 2006, respectively. The total unrecognized compensation cost related to all share-based compensation plans at April&nbsp;30, 2008 amounted to
approximately $9,624 which is expected to be recognized over the next three years. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As
of April&nbsp;30, 2008 and December&nbsp;31, 2007, TAP has recorded a liability for exercised options of $266 and $25,990, respectively, as a payable to Abbott. TAP also has
recorded a liability for options issued before the adoption of Emerging Issues Task Force Issue No.&nbsp;2-08, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Accounting for Options Granted to Employees in
Unrestricted, Publicly Traded Shares of an Unrelated Entity,</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> for the difference between the market value and strike price of vested yet unexercised options of $11,926 and
$20,838 as of April&nbsp;30, 2008 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>87</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=88,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="1",CHK=691288,FOLIO='87',FILE='DISK104:[08ZDH1.08ZDH73601]GM73601A.;22',USER='SLYUBOM',CD='18-FEB-2009;19:13' -->
<A NAME="page_gm73601_1_88"> </A>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;7. Incentive Stock Program (Continued) </B></FONT></P>

<BR>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>and
December&nbsp;31, 2007, respectively. Total expense (income) related to the Abbott Incentive Stock Program of $(21,825), $59,549 and $49,489 was recorded as Selling, general and administrative
expense in 2008, 2007 and 2006, respectively. The amount of income tax benefit realized from stock options exercised in 2008, 2007 and 2006, amounted to $1,327, $7,654 and $2,236, respectively. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
number of restricted stock units outstanding and the weighted-average grant date fair value at April&nbsp;30, 2008 and December&nbsp;31, 2007 was 26,588 and $49.66 and 43,791 and
$49.17, respectively. There were no restricted stock units granted during the four months ended April&nbsp;30, 2008. The number of restricted stock units and the weighted-average
grant-date fair value that vested during the four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008 were 17,203 and $48.42, respectively. There were no restricted stock units that lapsed during the four
months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008. The fair value of restricted stock units that vested in the first four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008 was $956. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Due
to the significant impact of fluctuations in the market price of Abbott common stock on the amount of recorded compensation expense of options issued under the Abbott Incentive Stock
Program, TAP entered into an ISDA Master Agreement (Master Agreement), dated September&nbsp;29, 2000, which allows TAP to enter into equity swap transactions to hedge this market price exposure.
Each equity swap transaction guarantees a return equal to the actual return on a specified number of shares of Abbott common stock and, as such, effectively acts as a hedge of the Abbott Incentive
Stock Program. From time to time, TAP enters into equity swap transactions under the Master Agreement. Each transaction has a term of one to three years and requires quarterly cash settlement
resulting in all gains and losses being realized and recorded in the statements of income. Each transaction requires
on-going quarterly interest payments based on the equity notional amount, or the fair value of Abbott common stock shares swapped under each transaction at the date of the swap at a rate
of LIBOR plus 114 basis points or 100 basis points for transactions prior to October 2003. This agreement ended on April&nbsp;2, 2008. Each equity swap transaction is recorded at fair value. The
fair value of equity swaps was $(10,593) as of December&nbsp;31, 2007, and is recorded as Accrued liabilities in the balance sheet for December&nbsp;31, 2007. For 2008, 2007 and 2006, TAP recorded
as Selling, general and administrative expenses $6,855, $(39,674) and $(47,554), respectively, of (gain) loss related to the equity swap investments. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;8. Income Taxes  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Taxes on earnings reflect the estimated annual effective rates, including charges for interest and penalties. Deferred income taxes reflect the tax consequences on future years of
differences between the tax bases of assets and liabilities and their financial reporting amounts. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TAP's
U.S. income tax liabilities for years 2001 and 2006 are subject to final determination by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS). The IRS has challenged the deductibility of an item in
TAP's 2001 tax return. Management believes its deduction is proper and expects the ultimate resolution will not have a material impact on TAP's financial position or results of operations. There are
numerous other income tax jurisdictions for which tax returns are not yet settled, none of which are individually significant. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>88</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<TD style="font-family:times;"><p style="font-family:times;margin-left:10pt;text-indent:-10pt;"><FONT SIZE=2> </FONT><FONT SIZE=2>Effective tax rate</FONT></TD>

<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>%</FONT></TD>

of April&nbsp;30, 2008 and December&nbsp;31, 2007, total deferred tax assets were $124,764 and $147,566, respectively, and total deferred tax liabilities were $7,082 and $9,686,
respectively. The tax effect of the differences that give rise to deferred tax assets and liabilities were as follows: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On
January&nbsp;1, 2007, TAP adopted the provisions of FASB Interpretation No.&nbsp;48, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes&nbsp;&#151; an
interpretation of FASB Statement No 109</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Under this Interpretation, in order to recognize an uncertain tax benefit, the taxpayer must be more likely than not of sustaining the
position, and the measurement of the benefit is calculated as the largest amount that is more than 50&nbsp;percent likely to be realized upon resolution of the benefit. Adoption of this
Interpretation did not have </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>89</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>a
material impact on TAP's financial position. The following summarizes the activity for the unrecognized tax benefits: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate is approximately $53,000. Due to the inherent uncertainties in tax audits, TAP is
unable to estimate the range of reasonably possible change in its unrecognized tax benefits, if any, within the next twelve months. Reserves for interest and penalties are not significant. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;9. Litigation and Related Matters  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There are several civil actions pending brought by individuals or entities that allege generally that TAP and numerous pharmaceutical companies reported false or misleading pricing
information relating to the average wholesale price of certain pharmaceutical products in connection with federal, state and
private reimbursement. Civil actions have also been brought against TAP and other members of the pharmaceutical industry, by state attorneys general seeking to recover alleged damages on behalf of
state Medicaid programs. The outcome of these investigations and litigation could include the imposition of fines and penalties. TAP is unable to estimate the amount of possible loss, and no loss
reserves have been recorded for these exposures. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Within
the next year, other legal proceedings may occur that may result in a change in the estimated reserves recorded by TAP. While it is not feasible to predict the outcome of such
pending claims, proceedings and investigations with certainty, management is of the opinion, except as noted in the paragraph above, that their ultimate disposition should not have a material adverse
effect on TAP's financial position, cash flows or results of operations. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;10. Related-Party Transactions  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Various agreements exist among TAP, Abbott and Takeda and subsidiaries. All amounts due from and payable to Abbott and Takeda and subsidiaries have been reflected in the balance sheets
in the captions Receivable from Abbott, Receivable from Takeda and subsidiaries, Payable to Abbott, and Payable to Takeda and subsidiaries. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TAP
purchases all </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lupron</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Prevacid</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> unpackaged finished goods inventories from Takeda
and subsidiaries. Purchases are contracted at fixed Yen-denominated prices. The amount paid to Takeda and subsidiaries for purchases of these inventories for the four months ending
April&nbsp;30, 2008, and years ended December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, totaled $209,205, $488,160 and $609,436, respectively. TAP has royalty agreements with Takeda and subsidiaries for sales of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Lupron</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>
and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Prevacid</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. For the four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008, and years ended
December&nbsp;31, 2007, and 2006, TAP recorded royalty expense of $48,042, $163,572 and $179,770, respectively. Beginning in 2007, TAP co-promotes certain Takeda and subsidiaries'
products. TAP recognized co-promotion revenue relating to this agreement of $21,748 for the four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008 and $79,422 for the year ended December&nbsp;31,
2007. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>90</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=91,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="1",CHK=743449,FOLIO='90',FILE='DISK104:[08ZDH1.08ZDH73601]GM73601A.;22',USER='SLYUBOM',CD='18-FEB-2009;19:13' -->
<A NAME="page_gm73601_1_91"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;10. Related-Party Transactions (Continued) </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TAP
pays Abbott for services related to packaging and warehousing, research and development and administrative functions. Amounts incurred for these services totaled $17,488, $53,967 and
$60,425 for the four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008, and years ended December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, respectively. In addition, Abbott purchased, for international markets, TAP's products for
$34,695, $93,437 and $84,515 for the four months ending April&nbsp;30, 2008, and for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, respectively. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Note&nbsp;11. Subsequent Event  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>S</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>ubsequent to April&nbsp;30, 2008, the estimate of exposure relating to the item in dispute with the IRS from the 2001 tax return (see
Note&nbsp;8) was increased by $22,000 as a result of negotiations with the IRS. Under the terms of the tax sharing agreement between Takeda and Abbott, this amount will be split evenly between the
two shareholders upon final settlement with the IRS. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>91</FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_gn73601_1_92"> </A>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->





<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B> REPORT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>To
the Board of Directors and Shareholders of<BR>
TAP Pharmaceutical Products,&nbsp;Inc.: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>We
have audited the accompanying consolidated balance sheets of TAP Pharmaceutical Products,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries (the "Company") as of April&nbsp;30, 2008, and December&nbsp;31, 2007, and
the related consolidated statements of income and comprehensive income, shareholders' equity, and cash flows for the four months ended April&nbsp;30, 2008, and the years ended December&nbsp;31,
2007 and 2006. These financial statements are the responsibility of the Company's management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on the financial statements based on our audits. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>We
conducted our audits in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States). Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain
reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement. The Company is not required to have, nor were we engaged to perform, an audit of its internal control
over financial reporting. Our audits included consideration of internal control over financial reporting as a basis for designing audit procedures that are appropriate in the circumstances, but not
for the purpose of expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting. Accordingly, we express no such opinion. An audit also includes examining, on
a test basis, evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial statements, assessing the accounting principles
used and significant estimates made by management, as well as evaluating the overall financial statement presentation. We believe that our audits provide a reasonable basis for our opinion. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>In
our opinion, such consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the financial position of TAP Pharmaceutical Products,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries as of
April&nbsp;30, 2008 and December&nbsp;31, 2007, and the results of their operations and their cash flows for the four months ended April&nbsp;30, 2008, and the years ended December&nbsp;31,
2007 and 2006, in conformity with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>As
described in Note&nbsp;1, the TAP joint venture was dissolved as of the close of business April&nbsp;30, 2008. As part of the dissolution, Abbott Laboratories receives the rights to the </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Lupron</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> business
and Takeda Pharmaceutical Company,&nbsp;Ltd. receives the rights to the </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Prevacid</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>
business. The TAP businesses will continue under the management of either Abbott or Takeda. Effective May&nbsp;1, 2008, TAP became a wholly owned subsidiary of Takeda America Holdings,&nbsp;Inc.
Subsequently, Takeda merged TAP into two other Takeda entities. The financial statements do not include any adjustments that might result from the outcome of this dissolution. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/
DELOITTE&nbsp;&amp; TOUCHE&nbsp;LLP </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Chicago,
Illinois<BR>
August&nbsp;27, 2008 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>92</FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="go73601_item_9._changes_in_and_disagre__ite03576"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_go73601_1"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  ITEM&nbsp;9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;None.  </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="go73601_item_9a._controls_and_procedures"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_go73601_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  ITEM&nbsp;9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Disclosure Controls and Procedures  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evaluation of disclosure controls and procedures.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Chief Executive Officer, Miles&nbsp;D. White, and the
Chief Financial Officer, Thomas&nbsp;C. Freyman, evaluated the effectiveness of Abbott Laboratories' disclosure controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered by this report, and
concluded that Abbott Laboratories' disclosure controls and procedures were effective to ensure that information Abbott is required to disclose in the reports that it files or submits with the
Securities and Exchange Commission under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is recorded, processed, summarized and reported, within the time periods specified in the Commission's rules and forms, and
to ensure that information required to be disclosed by Abbott in the reports that it files or submits under the Exchange Act is accumulated and communicated to Abbott's management, including its
principal executive officer and principal financial officer, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> Internal Control Over Financial Reporting  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Management's annual report on internal control over financial reporting.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Management's report on Abbott's internal control over
financial reporting is
included on page&nbsp;73 hereof. The report of Abbott's independent registered public accounting firm related to their assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting is
included on page&nbsp;75 hereof. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Changes in internal control over financial reporting.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;During the quarter ended December&nbsp;31, 2008, there were no changes in Abbott's
internal
control over financial reporting (as defined in Rule&nbsp;13a-15(f) under the Exchange Act) that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott's
internal control over financial reporting.  </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="go73601_item_9b._other_information"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;None. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="go73601_item_10._directors,_executive___ite02336"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_go73601_5"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  ITEM&nbsp;10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DIRECTORS, EXECUTIVE OFFICERS AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Incorporated herein by reference are "Information Concerning Nominees for Directors," "Committees of the Board of Directors,"
"Section&nbsp;16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance," and "Procedure for Recommendation and Nomination of Directors and Transaction of Business at Annual Meeting" to be included in the
2009 Abbott Laboratories Proxy Statement. The 2009 Proxy Statement will be filed on or about March&nbsp;13, 2009. Also incorporated herein by reference is the text found under the caption,
"Executive Officers of the Registrant" on pages&nbsp;19 through 22 hereof. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Abbott
has adopted a code of ethics that applies to its principal executive officer, principal financial officer, and principal accounting officer and controller. That code is part of
Abbott's code of business conduct which is available free of charge through Abbott's investor relations website (www.abbottinvestor.com) and is available in print to any shareholder who sends a
request for a paper copy to: Abbott Laboratories, 100 Abbott Park Road, Dept.&nbsp;362, AP6D2, Abbott Park, Illinois 60064-6048, attn. Investor Relations. Abbott intends to include on
its website (www.abbott.com) any amendment to, or waiver from, a provision of its code of ethics that applies to Abbott's principal executive officer, principal financial officer, and principal
accounting officer and controller that relates to any element of the code of ethics definition enumerated in Item&nbsp;406(b) of Regulation&nbsp;S-K.  </FONT></P>

NAME="go73601_item_11._executive_compensation"> </A>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="jg73601_report_of_independent___jg702289"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_jg73601_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  REPORT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>To
the Board of Directors and Shareholders of Abbott Laboratories: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We
have audited the consolidated financial statements of Abbott Laboratories and subsidiaries (the "Company") as of December&nbsp;31, 2008, 2007, and 2006, and for the years then
ended, and the Company's internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 2008, and have issued our reports thereon dated February&nbsp;19, 2009, which report relating to the
consolidated financial statements expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph regarding the adoption of new accounting standards in 2007 and 2006; such reports are included
elsewhere in this Form&nbsp;10-K. Our audits also included the consolidated financial statement schedule of the Company listed in Item&nbsp;15. This consolidated financial statement
schedule is the responsibility of the Company's management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion based on our audits. In our opinion, such consolidated financial statement schedule, when
considered in relation to the basic consolidated financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly, in all material respects, the information set forth therein. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/
DELOITTE&nbsp;&amp; TOUCHE&nbsp;LLP </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Chicago,
Illinois<BR>
February&nbsp;19, 2009 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>99</FONT></P>

<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>)</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>54,141</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Represents
provisions related to allowances for doubtful accounts and net change in the allowances for sales deductions. </FONT></DD></DL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>100</FONT></P>

<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=101,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="1",CHK=402988,FOLIO='100',FILE='DISK104:[08ZDH1.08ZDH73601]JG73601A.;15',USER='MWEINST',CD='20-FEB-2009;13:38' -->
<A NAME="page_jg73601_1_101"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="jg73601_report_of_independent___jg702303"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_jg73601_3"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  REPORT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>To
the Board of Directors and Shareholders of TAP Pharmaceutical Products&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We
have audited the consolidated financial statements of TAP Pharmaceutical Products&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries (the "Company") as of April&nbsp;30, 2008, and December&nbsp;31,
2007 and 2006, and for the four
months ended April&nbsp;30, 2008, and the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, and have issued our report thereon dated August&nbsp;27, 2008; such consolidated financial statements and
report are included in this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K. Our audits also included the consolidated financial statement schedule of the Company listed in Item&nbsp;15. This
consolidated financial statement schedule is the responsibility of the Company's management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion based on our audits. In our opinion, such consolidated
financial statement schedule, when considered in relation to the basic consolidated financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly, in all material respects, the information set forth therein. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/
DELOITTE&nbsp;&amp; TOUCHE&nbsp;LLP </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Chicago,
Illinois<BR>
August&nbsp;27, 2008 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>101</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

60064-6400. </FONT></P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.1
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>a2188623zex-4_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 4.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 4.1</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE I</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Introduction</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Purpose</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan is designed to assist the Employers in attracting and retaining
key employees by providing those employees with the opportunity to defer the
receipt of a portion of their compensation and to have that deferred
compensation treated as if it were invested pending its distribution by the
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ERISA</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan is intended to be exempt from Parts 2, 3, and 4 of Title I of
ERISA and, therefore, participation in the Plan is limited to a select group of
management and highly compensated employees, within the meaning of Sections
201(2), 301(a)3 and 401(a)(1)&nbsp;of ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employers</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">After the Effective Date, any Subsidiary of the
Company that is not then an Employer may adopt the Plan with the Company&#146;s
consent as described in <b>Section&nbsp;13.12</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Employer shall be liable to the Company for an
amount equal to the Plan benefits earned by its Eligible Employees.&#160; Where an Eligible Employee has been employed
by more than one Employer, the Plan Administrator shall allocate the liability
to the Company associated with that Eligible Employee&#146;s Plan benefits among his
or her Employers.&#160; The Plan Administrator
shall establish procedures for determining the time at which and manner in
which the Employers shall pay this liability to the Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Grandfathered Amounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything in this Plan to the contrary, any amounts under
this Plan that were earned and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (as
determined in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;409A) (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;)
shall be subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan as administered and as
in effect on October&nbsp;3, 2004.&#160;
Amendments made to the Plan pursuant to this amendment and restatement
or otherwise shall not affect the Grandfathered Amounts unless expressly
provided for in the amendment.&#160; The terms
and conditions applicable to the Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in
Appendix A attached hereto.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=392841,FOLIO='1',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Effective Date</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan has been amended and restated, effective as of January&nbsp;1,
2008 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE II</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Definitions</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">When used in this Plan, unless
the context clearly requires a different meaning, the following words and terms
shall have the meanings set forth below.&#160;
Whenever appropriate, words used in the singular shall be deemed to
include the plural, and <i>vice versa</i>,
and the masculine gender shall be deemed to include the feminine gender.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Account</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established for record keeping
purposes for each Participant pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;VI</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Base Compensation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Base Compensation&#148; means the Participant&#146;s total compensation earned in
a Plan Year for personal service actually rendered to an Employer, including
sales bonuses, sales incentives and sales commissions (excluding Eligible
Bonuses, all other bonuses, commissions, relocation expenses, reimbursements,
expense allowances, fringe benefits (cash or noncash), welfare benefits
(whether or not those amounts are includible in gross income) and other
non-regular forms of compensation) before deductions for (i)&nbsp;Deferral
Elections made pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.1</b>
or (ii)&nbsp;contributions made on the Participant&#146;s behalf to any Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan
or to any cafeteria plan under Section&nbsp;125 of the Internal Revenue Code of
1986, as amended (the &#147;Code&#148;) maintained by an Employer.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Beneficiary</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the person, persons or entity designated by the
Participant to receive any benefits payable under the Plan pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;IX</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Board of Review</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Board of Review&#148; means the Abbott Laboratories Employee Benefit Board
of Review appointed and acting under the Abbott Laboratories Annuity Retirement
Plan and having the powers and duties described in this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Company</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Company&#148; means Abbott Laboratories, its successors, any organization
into which or with which Abbott Laboratories may merge or consolidate or to
which all or substantially all of its assets may be transferred.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Deferral Election&#148; means an election under the Plan by a Participant to
defer the receipt of a portion of his or her Eligible Compensation made on a
Deferral Election Form.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.7</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral Election Form</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Deferral Election Form&#148; means the form provided to the Participant by
the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.1</b>
on which the Participant makes his or her Deferral Election.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.8</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral Account</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Deferral Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established for record
keeping purposes for each Participant&#146;s Deferral Election pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;6.1</b>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=311596,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.9</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Disability</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The date of &#147;Disability&#148; of a Participant means that, the date on which
the Participant is, by reason of any medically determinable physical or mental
impairment that can be expected to result in death or can be expected to last
for a continuous period of not less than twelve months, eligible to receive
income replacement benefits under the terms of the Abbott Laboratories Extended
Disability Plan (&#147;EDP&#148;) or, for a Participant whose Employer does not
participate in the EDP, such similar accident and health plan, providing income
replacement benefits, in which his or her Employer participates, for a period
of six months.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.10</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Distribution Election&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(a)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.11</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution Election Form</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Distribution Election Form&#148; means the form provided to the Participant
by the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b>
on which the Participant specifies the time at which the amounts credited to
one of the Participant&#146;s Account(s)&nbsp;are to be distributed and their method
of payment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.12</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Effective Date</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Effective Date&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;1.5</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.13</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Eligibility Date</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Eligibility Date&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;3.1(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.13</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Eligible Bonus</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Eligible Bonus&#148; means an annual cash incentive bonus for a Plan Year
that the Plan Administrator, or its delegate, has designated as being eligible
for deferral under the Plan.&#160; As of the
Effective Date, cash bonuses paid under the Abbott Laboratories Cash Profit
Sharing Plan or any Employer&#146;s annual incentive bonus plan with a performance
period commencing on January&nbsp;1 and ending on December&nbsp;31 of the
applicable Plan Year are eligible for deferral under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.14</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Eligible Compensation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Eligible Compensation&#148; means the Participant&#146;s Base Compensation and
Eligible Bonuses.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.15</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Eligible Employee</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means any person employed by an Employer who is both</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a United States employee or an
expatriate who is based and paid in the United States, and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">shown as having a grade level of 20
(or equivalent level of compensation if on a different pay grade system) or
higher on his or her Employer&#146;s Human Resource System</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and who is not (a)&nbsp;both an
officer of the Company and eligible to participate in the Abbott Laboratories
401(k)&nbsp;Supplemental Plan, except as contemplated by <b>Section&nbsp;3.1</b>
hereof for the Plan Year in which the person is first named an officer, (b)&nbsp;an
individual who provides services to an Employer under a contract, arrangement
or understanding with either the individual directly or with an agency or
leasing organization that treats the individual as either an independent
contractor or an employee of such agency or leasing organization, even if such
individual is subsequently determined (by an Employer, the Internal Revenue
Service, any other governmental agency, judicial action, or otherwise) to have
been a common law employee of an </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=434287,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employer rather than an
independent contractor or employee of such agency or leasing organization, or (c)&nbsp;any
Employee who is employed by an Employer located in Puerto Rico, other than any
person designated as a &#147;U.S. Expatriate&#148; on the records of an Employer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For all Plan purposes, an
individual shall be an &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; for any Plan Year only if during
that Plan Year an Employer treats that individual as its employee for purposes
of employment taxes and wage withholding for Federal income taxes, even if such
individual is subsequently determined (by an Employer, the Internal Revenue
Service, any other governmental agency, judicial action, or otherwise) to have
been a common law employee of an Employer in that Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.16</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Employer&#148; shall mean the Company, the participating Employers on the
Effective Date, and any Subsidiary of the Company that subsequently adopts the
Plan in the manner provided in <b>Section&nbsp;13.12</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.17</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer Contribution</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Employer Contribution&#148; means the contribution deemed to have been made
by an Employer pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;5.1</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.18</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer Contribution Account</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Employer Contribution Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established
for record keeping purposes for each Participant&#146;s Employer Contributions
pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;6.1</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.19</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan&#148; means any defined contribution retirement
plan that is maintained by an Employer, qualified under Code Section&nbsp;401(a),
and includes a cash or deferred arrangement under Code Section&nbsp;401(k).&#160; The term shall specifically include, but not
be limited to, the Abbott Laboratories 401(k)&nbsp;Plan and the Abbott
Laboratories Stock Retirement Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.20</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ERISA</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;ERISA&#148; means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as
amended.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.21</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Hardship Distribution</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Hardship Distribution&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;8.5(a)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.22</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In-Service Distribution</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;In-Service Distribution&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.23</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Initial Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Initial Election&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(a)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.24</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Investment Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Investment Election&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.2(a)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.25</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Investment Election Form</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Investment Election Form&#148; means the form provided to the Participant by
the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2</b>
on which the Participant specifies the Investment Funds in which the
Participant&#146;s Account(s)&nbsp;are to be deemed to be invested.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.26</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Investment Fund(s)</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Investment Fund(s)&#148; means one or more of the funds selected by the Plan
Administrator pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2</b>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=1014762,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.27</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Investment Fund Subaccounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Investment Fund Subaccounts&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;6.1(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.28</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Matching DCP Deferral</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Matching DCP Deferral&#148; for a Participant for a Plan Year is an amount
equal to the total dollar amount of the Participant&#146;s deferrals for the Plan
Year pursuant to Employee Deferral Elections under Section&nbsp;4.1(b), but in
no event shall a Participant&#146;s Matching DCP Deferral for a Plan Year exceed the
amount by which (a)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s Base Compensation for the Plan Year
up to the limit on compensation as defined in Code Section&nbsp;401(a)(17)
exceeds (b)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s Base Compensation for the Plan Year less the
total dollar amount deferred pursuant to Employee Deferral Elections under Section&nbsp;4.1(b)&nbsp;for
the Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.29</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participant</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Participant&#148; means any Eligible Employee who elects to participate in
this Plan by filing a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election, and
Distribution Election as provided in <b>Article&nbsp;IV</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.30</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Plan</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Plan&#148; means the Abbott Laboratories Deferred Compensation Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.31</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Plan Administrator</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Plan Administrator&#148; means the Board of Review.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.32</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Plan Year</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Plan Year&#148; means a twelve-month period beginning January&nbsp;1 and
ending the following December&nbsp;31.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.33</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Rate of Return</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Rate of Return&#148; means, for each Investment Fund, an amount equal to the
net gain or net loss (expressed as a percentage) on the assets of that
Investment Fund.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.34</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Retirement</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Retirement&#148; means a Termination of Employment after having satisfied
the age and service requirements of Subsection (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;below, as
applicable:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">With respect to Participants covered by the Abbott
Laboratories Annuity Retirement Plan:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">for the Participant hired before
2004, the date on which the Participant attains age 50 and completes 10 years
of &#147;vesting service&#148; (as such term is described in the Abbott Laboratories
Annuity Retirement Plan); or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">for the Participant hired after
2003, the date on which the Participant attains age 55 and completes 10 years
of vesting service.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">With respect to Participants covered by the Abbott
Laboratories Pension Plan for Former BASF Employees, the date on which the
Participant attains age 55 and completes 5 years of vesting service (as such
term is described in the Abbott Laboratories Pension Plan for Former BASF
Employees).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.35</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subsequent Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Subsequent Election&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.2(a)</b>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=54492,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.36</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subsidiary</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Subsidiary&#148; shall mean any corporation, limited liability company,
partnership, joint venture, or business trust organized in the United States 50
percent or more of the voting stock of which is owned, directly or indirectly,
by the Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.37</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Termination of Employment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Termination of Employment&#148; means the cessation of a Participant&#146;s
services as an employee, whether voluntary or involuntary, for any reason other
than death; provided, that the Participant shall not be considered to have
terminated employment for purposes of the Plan until he or she would be
considered to have incurred a &#147;separation from service&#148; from the Employer
within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.37</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Unforeseeable Emergency</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Unforeseeable Emergency&#148; means a severe financial hardship to the
Participant resulting from an illness or accident of the Participant, the
Participant&#146;s spouse or a dependent of the Participant, loss of the Participant&#146;s
property due to casualty (including the need to rebuild a home following damage
to a home not otherwise covered by insurance, for example, not as a result of a
natural disaster), or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable
circumstances arising as a result of events beyond the control of the
Participant as determined by the Plan Administrator.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE III</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participation</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>
