<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Except as provided in <b>Sections 3.1(b)&nbsp;and (c)</b>, an Eligible Employee may become
a Participant by making a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election, and
Distribution Election pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;IV</b>
on or before the deadline set by the Plan Administrator pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.4</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A newly hired individual who is an Eligible Employee
shall become eligible to participate in the Plan on the first day of the month
next following the month after the individual&#146;s date of hire (the &#147;Eligibility
Date&#148;); provided, that in no event shall such individual begin to participate
in the plan later than 90 days following his or her date of hire.&#160; Notwithstanding the election requirements of Section&nbsp;3.1(a),
a newly Eligible Employee who was not eligible to participate in any other plan
that would be aggregated with the Plan under Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(c)&nbsp;may
make a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election and Distribution Election
pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;IV </b>within the thirty
(30) day period immediately following the Eligibility Date.&#160; Any such election shall become effective for
Eligible Compensation earned no earlier than the first payroll period
commencing after receipt of the election by the Plan Administrator and shall be
irrevocable for the remainder of the Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">An individual who becomes an Eligible Employee as a
result of a job promotion or transfer may only make a Deferral Election,
Investment Fund Election and Distribution Election pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;IV</b> with respect to Eligible Compensation to be
earned in the Plan Year next following the year of such promotion or
transfer.&#160; Any such election shall be
made in accordance with <b>Article&nbsp;IV</b>
and shall become effective for Eligible Compensation earned in the Plan Year
following the year in which the election is made.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=539852,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Termination of Participation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A Participant who ceases to be an Eligible Employee due to a Termination
of Employment will remain a Participant but (i)&nbsp;may no longer make
Deferral Elections with respect to any Plan Year following the year of such
termination and (ii)&nbsp;all deferrals under the Plan shall cease as of the
date of the Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment.&#160; A Participant who ceases to be an Eligible
Employee due to a job promotion (or demotion) may no longer make Deferral
Elections with respect to any Plan Year following the year of such promotion or
demotion but the Participant&#146;s Deferral Elections for the Plan Year in which
such promotion or demotion occurs shall remain irrevocable.&#160; A Participant shall remain a Participant
until (i)&nbsp;his or her death or (ii)&nbsp;his or her Accounts have been
distributed.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE IV</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Election Forms</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral Elections</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participants shall make their Deferral Elections
annually on a form provided by the Plan Administrator (a &#147;Deferral Election
Form&#148;). Each Deferral Election shall apply to only a single Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">On his or her Deferral Election Form, the Participant
shall specify the amount (expressed as a percentage) of his or her Base
Compensation and the amount (also expressed as a percentage) of his or her
Eligible Bonuses that the Participant elects to defer for that Plan Year
together with such other information as the Plan Administrator may, in its sole
and absolute discretion, require.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For any Plan Year, a Participant may elect to defer:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">between five percent (5%) and
seventy-five percent (75%) of his or her Base Compensation (in whole percentage
increments), and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">between five percent (5%) and one
hundred percent (100%) of his or her Eligible Bonus (in whole percentage
increments);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided, however, that in no
event may a Participant elect to defer his or her Eligible Compensation to the
extent that his or her remaining compensation would be insufficient to satisfy
all applicable withholding taxes and contributions required under Employer
sponsored benefit plans in which the Participant participates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A Participant may not revoke his or her Deferral
Election at any time after the deadline for making such Deferral Election set
by the Plan Administrator pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.4</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Investment Elections</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan Administrator shall, from time to time, make available investment
options (the &#147;Investment Funds&#148;) that serve as benchmark funds for the amounts
a Participant defers under the Plan.&#160; A
Participant&#146;s Plan deferrals shall not actually be invested in the Investment
Funds and the Participant shall not be considered a shareholder of any of the
Investment Funds he or she selects by virtue of participation in the Plan.&#160; Instead, the Participant&#146;s Plan deferrals
shall be considered invested in, and his or her Plan Account shall </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=1032001,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">reflect such Investment Fund&#146;s Rate of
Return. A Participant&#146;s election of investments shall be subject to the
following rules:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participants shall make their investment elections on
an Investment Election Form&nbsp;provided by the Plan Administrator (an &#147;Investment
Election&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Investment Election Form&nbsp;completed by the
Participant shall apply only to the Eligible Compensation being deferred in a
single Plan Year and shall specify the Investment Funds in which the deferrals
for each such Plan Year are to be deemed to be invested, and the portion
(expressed in whole percentage increments) of the deferrals for such Plan Year
that are to be deemed to be invested in each such Investment Fund, and shall
continue in effect until revoked or changed as permitted by the Plan
Administrator.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution Elections</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participants shall make their distribution elections
in accordance with the Distribution Election Form&nbsp;provided by the Plan
Administrator (a &#147;Distribution Election&#148;) as permitted or required by such
form.&#160; Each Distribution Election (the &#147;Initial
Election&#148;) shall apply only to the Eligible Compensation being deferred in a
single Plan Year and must be made by the deadline set by the Plan Administrator
pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.4</b>, at which time
the Initial Election shall be irrevocable, subject to <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(c)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">On the Distribution Election Form:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Mandatory Retirement Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
In all cases, the Participant shall select the method of payment from
among the methods of payment described in <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)&nbsp;</b>to
apply in the event payment is made upon Retirement pursuant to this
Distribution Election in accordance with <b>Sections 8.3 or 8.4</b>
or upon Disability in accordance with <b>Section&nbsp;8.7</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Optional In-Service Distribution Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Participant shall also have the option to elect that the Eligible
Compensation being deferred for that Plan Year shall be paid to the Participant
while he or she is still employed by an Employer (an &#147;In-Service Distribution&#148;).&#160; If the Participant elects to receive an
In-Service Distribution of the Eligible Compensation being deferred, then the
Participant shall also select the year in which the payments are to be
made.&#160; A Participant may not elect to receive
an In-Service Distribution in a Plan Year that is less than two (2)&nbsp;years
after the end of the Plan Year in which the Eligible Compensation is earned.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b>, a Participant may change the form of
distribution or his or her Distribution Election (a &#147;Subsequent Election&#148;) to
the extent permitted by the Plan Administrator and Code Section&nbsp;409A(a)(4)(C),
including the requirements that such Subsequent Election:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=791943,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">shall not take effect until at least
12 months after the date on which the Subsequent Election is filed with the
Plan Administrator;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">shall result in the first
distribution subject to such Subsequent Election being made at least five years
after the date such distribution would otherwise have been paid pursuant to the
previous election; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">shall be filed with the Plan
Administrator at least 12 months before the date the first scheduled
distribution is to be paid pursuant to the previous election.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deadline for Submitting Election
Forms</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; The Plan Administrator may set a deadline or
deadlines for the receipt of the election forms required under the Plan;
provided, however, that, except as provided in <b>Section&nbsp;3.1(b)</b>,
such forms must be filed on or before the end of the year immediately preceding
the Plan Year for which it is to be effective.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE V</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employer
Contributions</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer Contributions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Each Participant who makes a Deferral Election will be credited with an
Employer Contribution equal to 5% of the Participant&#146;s Matching DCP
Deferral.&#160; The Plan Administrator may,
however, in his or her discretion, otherwise set the amount of the Employer
Contribution, subject to and not in excess of applicable limits imposed by the
Internal Revenue Service.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Allocation of Employer Contributions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A Participant&#146;s Employer Contribution for a Plan Year shall be allocated
among the same Investment Funds and in the same proportion as the Participant
has elected for his or her deferrals for that Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Employer
Contributions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; An Employer Contribution for a Plan Year
shall be distributed to the Participant according to the election made by the
Participant governing his or her deferrals for that same Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VI</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Maintenance
and Crediting of Accounts</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Maintenance of Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Plan shall maintain a separate Account for each
Deferral Election (a &#147;Deferral Account&#148;) made by and each Employer Contribution
(an &#147;Employer Contribution Account&#148;) made for a Participant.&#160; A Participant&#146;s Accounts shall reflect the
Participant&#146;s Investment Fund Elections and Distribution Elections made
pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;IV</b>, any
Employer Contributions made on behalf of the Participant pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;V</b>, adjustments to the Account
made pursuant to this <b>Article&nbsp;VI</b>,
and distributions made with respect to the Account pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;VIII</b>.&#160; The Accounts shall be used solely as a device
for the </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=465014,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">measurement and determination of the amounts
to be paid to the Participants pursuant to this Plan and shall not constitute
or be treated as a trust fund of any kind.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Account shall be divided into separate
subaccounts (&#147;Investment Fund Subaccounts&#148;), each of which corresponds to the
Investment Fund selected by the Participant pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Crediting of Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">No later than five (5)&nbsp;business days following
the end of each pay period, the Plan shall credit each Participant&#146;s Investment
Fund Subaccounts to reflect amounts deferred from the Participant&#146;s Eligible
Compensation during that pay period and the Investment Fund Election made by
the Participant with respect to that Eligible Compensation.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the end of each Plan Year, the Plan shall credit
each Participant&#146;s Investment Fund Subaccounts to reflect any Employer
Contribution deemed to have been made on behalf of the Participant for that
Plan Year and the allocation of that contribution among the Investment Funds
pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Plan Administrator shall adjust each Investment
Fund Subaccount to reflect any transfers under the Plan to or from that
Investment Fund Subaccount, as of the end of each business day to reflect any
distributions under the Plan made with respect to that Investment Fund
Subaccount, and the Rate of Return on the related Investment Fund.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Statement of Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Each Participant shall be issued quarterly statements of his or her
Account(s)&nbsp;in such form as the Plan Administrator deems desirable, setting
forth the balance to the credit of such Participant in his or her Account(s)&nbsp;as
of the end of the most recently completed quarter.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VII</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Vesting and
Forfeitures</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A Participant&#146;s Deferral Accounts shall be one hundred percent (100%)
vested and non-forfeitable at all times.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employer Contribution Account</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A Participant&#146;s Employer Contribution Account shall
become one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable when the matching
contributions made by the Participant&#146;s Employer on behalf of the Participant
under the Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan in which the Participant participates
become one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">If a Participant&#146;s employment with the Employers
terminates (whether voluntarily or involuntarily) before the matching
contributions made by the Participant&#146;s Employer on behalf of the Participant
under the Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan in which the Participant participates
become one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable, then the
Participant shall forfeit his or her related Employer Contribution Account.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=309356,FOLIO='10',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 21:07 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VIII</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Distribution
of Benefits</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Benefits in the
Event of a Termination of Employment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; If a
Participant elects to receive his or her Plan benefits as an In-Service
Distribution, then in the event of that Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment
(other than due to Retirement) prior to receiving that In-Service Distribution,
the Company shall pay that Participant&#146;s Plan benefits in a lump-sum to the
Participant within 90 days following his or her Termination of Employment. &#160;If a Participant elects to receive his or her
Plan benefits upon Retirement, then in the event of that Participant&#146;s
Termination of Employment prior to the date the Participant attains eligibility
for Retirement, the Company shall pay that Participant&#146;s Plan benefits in a
lump-sum to the Participant within 90 days following his or her Termination of
Employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In-Service Distributions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Subject to the provisions of <b>Section&nbsp;8.6</b>,
the Company shall pay In-Service Distributions in a lump-sum to the Participant
on the first business day in February&nbsp;of the year designated by the
Participant on his or her Distribution Election Form.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Benefits in the
Event of Retirement</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">If, pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b>,
a Participant has elected to receive his or her Plan benefits for a Plan Year
upon his or her Retirement, then the Company shall pay the Participant his or
her Plan benefits commencing on the first business day in February&nbsp;next
following the date of the Participant&#146;s Retirement in any of the following
forms pursuant to the Participant&#146;s Initial Election or Subsequent Election, as
applicable:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">in substantially equal quarterly or
annual installments to the Participant over fifteen (15) years; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">in substantially equal quarterly or
annual installments to the Participant over ten (10)&nbsp;years; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">in substantially equal quarterly or
annual installments to the Participant over five (5)&nbsp;years; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">in a lump-sum; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">if no such election is on file with
the Plan Administrator, in substantially equal quarterly installments to the
Participant over ten (10)&nbsp;years.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Quarterly installments shall be paid on the
first business day of each calendar quarter and annual installments shall be
paid on the first business day of each calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding the provisions of <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)</b>,
in the event that, as of the date of the Participant&#146;s Retirement, the
Participant&#146;s benefits under the Plan do not exceed, in the aggregate, $15,500,
the Participant&#146;s benefits shall be paid to the Participant in a lump-sum.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=437676,FOLIO='11',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Benefits on the
Earlier to Occur of a Participant&#146;s Retirement or a Specified Date</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a Participant has elected to
receive his or her Plan benefits on a specified date pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(b)(ii)</b>, if the Participant&#146;s Retirement
occurs prior to such specified date,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For amounts deferred with respect to Plan Years
beginning prior to January&nbsp;1, 2008, the Company shall pay the Participant
his or her Plan benefits in a lump sum on the first business day in February&nbsp;next
following the Participant&#146;s Retirement; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For amounts deferred with respect to Plan Years
beginning on or after January&nbsp;1, 2008, the Company shall pay the
Participant his or her Plan benefits in accordance with <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)</b>,
subject to <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distributions Due to Unforeseeable
Emergency</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A Participant may receive the early payment of all or
part of the balance in his or her Account(s)&nbsp;in the event of an
Unforeseeable Emergency (a &#147;Hardship Distribution&#148;) subject to the following
restrictions:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Participant has requested the
Hardship Distribution from the Plan Administrator on a form provided by or in
the format requested by the Plan Administrator;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Plan Administrator has
determined that an Unforeseeable Emergency has occurred;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Plan Administrator determines
the amount of the Hardship Distribution, which amount will be limited to the
amount reasonably necessary to satisfy the emergency need (including any
amounts necessary to pay any Federal, state, local or foreign income taxes or
penalties reasonably anticipated to result from the Hardship Distribution); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Hardship Distribution shall be distributed
in a lump-sum within 30 days following determination by the Plan Administrator
of the amount of the Hardship Distribution.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The circumstances that would constitute a
Unforeseeable Emergency will depend on the facts and circumstances of each case,
but, in any case, a Hardship Distribution may not be made to the extent that
such hardship may be relieved through (i)&nbsp;reimbursement or compensation by
insurance or otherwise, (ii)&nbsp;liquidation of the Participant&#146;s assets, to
the extent that liquidation of the Participant&#146;s assets would not itself cause
severe financial hardship, or (iii)&nbsp;by cessation of deferrals under this
Plan in compliance with Code Section&nbsp;409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Benefits in the
Event of Death</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; In the event of a Participant&#146;s death prior
to the complete distribution of his or her Accounts, the Company shall</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=859832,FOLIO='12',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">distribute his or her total Plan benefits to
his or her Beneficiary in a lump sum within 90 days after the date of the
Participant&#146;s death.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.7</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Distribution of Benefits in the
Event of Disability</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of a Participant&#146;s
Disability, the Company shall pay the Participant his or her Plan benefits
commencing on the first business day in February&nbsp;next following the date
of the Participant&#146;s Disability in the form set forth below:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For any Participant who has elected to receive his or
her Plan benefits upon Retirement, pursuant to the Participant&#146;s Distribution
Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in one of the Retirement forms
permitted under <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)</b>, subject to <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For a Participant who has elected to receive his or
her Plan benefits as an In-Service Distribution, if the Participant&#146;s
Disability occurs prior to the date specified in such Distribution Election:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For amounts deferred with respect to
Plan Years beginning on or subsequent to January&nbsp;1, 2008, pursuant to the
Participant&#146;s Distribution Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in one
of the Retirement forms permitted under <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)</b>,
subject to <b>Section&nbsp;8.3(b)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For amounts deferred with respect to
all Plan Years beginning prior to January&nbsp;1, 2008, pursuant to the
Participant&#146;s Distribution Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in a
lump sum under <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(b)(ii)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.8</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Postponing or Amending Distributions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A Participant may postpone a scheduled distribution or amend the form of
distribution specified in <b>Section&nbsp;8.2,</b>
<b>Section&nbsp;8.3(a)&nbsp;</b>or <b>Section&nbsp;8.4</b> only by making a Subsequent Election
pursuant to the terms of <b>Section&nbsp;4.3(c)</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE IX</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Beneficiary
Designation</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Beneficiary Designation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Each Participant shall have the right, at any time, to designate any
person, persons or entity as his or her Beneficiary or Beneficiaries. A
Beneficiary designation shall be made, and may be amended, by the Participant
by filing a designation with the Plan Administrator, on such form and in
accordance with such procedures as the Plan Administrator may establish from
time to time.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Failure to Designate a Beneficiary</u>.&#160; If a Participant or Beneficiary fails to
designate a Beneficiary as provided above, or if all designated Beneficiaries
predecease the Participant or his or her Beneficiary, then the Participant&#146;s
Beneficiary shall be deemed to be, in the following order:</p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to the spouse of such person, if
any; or</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=278666,FOLIO='13',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to the deceased person&#146;s estate.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Facility of Payment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
When, in the Plan Administrator&#146;s opinion, a Participant or Beneficiary
is under a legal disability or is incapacitated in any way so as to be unable
to manage his or her financial affairs, the Plan Administrator may make any
benefit payments to the Participant or Beneficiary&#146;s legal representative, or
spouse, or the Plan Administrator may apply the payment for the benefit of the
Participant or Beneficiary in any way the Plan Administrator considers
advisable, in each case, without subjecting the Participant or Beneficiary to
accelerated taxation and/or tax penalties under Code Section&nbsp;409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE X</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Administration
of Plan</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Plan Administrator</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Board of Review, or such person as the Board of Review shall
designate pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;10.3</b>,<b>  </b>shall serve as the Plan Administrator of
the Plan. The administration of the Plan shall be under the supervision of the
Plan Administrator. It shall be a principal duty of the Plan Administrator to
see that the Plan is carried out, in accordance with its terms, for the
exclusive benefit of persons entitled to participate in the Plan without
discrimination<b>  </b>among them.
Benefits under the Plan shall be paid only if the Plan Administrator decides,
in his or her discretion, that the applicant is entitled to them. The Plan
Administrator will have full power to administer the Plan in all of its
details, subject to applicable requirements of law. For this purpose, the Plan
Administrator&#146;s powers will include but will not be limited to, the following
authority, in addition to all other powers provided by this Plan:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To make and enforce such rules&nbsp;and
regulations as it deems necessary or proper for the efficient administration of
the Plan, including the establishment of any claims procedures that may be
required by applicable provisions of law;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To exercise discretion in
interpreting the Plan, any interpretation to be reviewed under the arbitrary
and capricious standard;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To exercise discretion in deciding
all questions concerning the Plan and the eligibility of any person to
participate in the Plan; such decision to be reviewed under the arbitrary and
capricious standard;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To appoint such agents, counsel,
accountants, consultants and other persons as may be required to assist in
administering the Plan;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To allocate and delegate its responsibilities
under the Plan and to designate other persons to carry out any of its
responsibilities under the Plan, any such allocations, delegation or
designation to be in writing;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=14,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=64833,FOLIO='14',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To determine the amount and type of
benefits to which any Participant or Beneficiary shall be entitled hereunder,
including the method and date for all valuations under the Plan;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To receive from the Employers and
from Participants such information as shall be necessary for the proper
administration of the Plan or any of its programs;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To maintain or cause to be
maintained all the necessary records for the administration of the Plan;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>
