<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To receive, review and keep on file
(as it deems convenient and proper) reports of benefit payments made by the
Plan;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(x)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To determine and allocate among the
Employers the liability to the Company associated with Plan benefits in
accordance with <b>Section&nbsp;1.3</b>
and to determine the time at which and manner in which that liability shall be
paid to the Company;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To make, or cause to be made,
equitable adjustments for any mistakes or errors made in the administration of
the Plan; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To do all other acts which the Plan
Administrator deems necessary or proper to accomplish and implement its
responsibilities under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Reliance on Tables, etc</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
In administering the Plan, the Plan Administrator will be entitled to
the extent permitted by law to rely conclusively on all tables, valuations,
certificates, opinions and reports which are furnished by, or in accordance
with the instructions of accountants, counsel, or other experts employed or
engaged by the Plan Administrator.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Delegation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Board of Review shall have the authority to appoint another
corporation or one or more other persons to serve as the Plan Administrator
hereunder, in which event such corporation or person (or persons) shall
exercise all of the powers, duties, responsibilities, and obligations of the
Plan Administrator hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Operations</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The day to day operation of the Plan will be handled by the person or
persons designated by the Plan Administrator.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Uniform Rules</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan Administrator shall administer the Plan on a reasonable and
nondiscriminatory basis and shall apply uniform rules&nbsp;to all similarly
situated Participants.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Plan Administrator&#146;s Decisions Final</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Any interpretation of the provisions of the Plan (including but not
limited to the provisions of any of its Programs) and any decision on any
matter within the discretion of the Plan Administrator made by the Plan
Administrator in good faith shall be binding on all persons. A misstatement or
other mistake of fact shall be corrected when it becomes known and the Plan Administrator
shall make such adjustment on </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=15,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=1033324,FOLIO='15',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">account thereof as it considers equitable and
practicable. Neither the Plan Administrator nor any Employer shall be liable in
any manner for any determination of fact made in good faith.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE XI</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Claims for
Benefits</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Claims and Review Procedures</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Plan Administrator shall adopt procedures for the filing and review
of claims in accordance with Section&nbsp;503 of ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE XII</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amendment and
Termination of Plan</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;12.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Amendment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Company may amend this Plan, in whole or in part, at any time
provided, however, that no amendment shall be effective to decrease the balance
in any Account as accrued at the time of such amendment. Any amendment which
would allow officers of the Company to participate in the Plan shall require
the approval of the Abbott Laboratories Board of Directors. Any amendment which
increases the total cost of the Plan to the Employers in excess of $250,000 in
each of the three full calendar years next following the date of the amendment
shall be approved by the Board of Review.&#160;
The Senior Vice President, Human Resources of the Company shall approve
all other amendments to the Plan and the extension of the Plan to any division
or Subsidiary of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;12.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Termination</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Board of Review may at any time terminate the Plan with respect to
future Deferral Elections.&#160; The Board of
Review may also terminate and liquidate the Plan in its entirety; provided that
such termination and liquidation are consistent with the provisions of Code Section&nbsp;409A.&#160; Upon any such termination, the Company shall
pay to the Participant the benefits the Participant is entitled to receive
under the Plan, determined as of the termination date, in compliance with Code Section&nbsp;409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE XIII</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Miscellaneous</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Unfunded Plan</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
This Plan is intended to be an unfunded plan maintained primarily for
the purpose of providing deferred compensation for a select group of management
or highly compensated employees, within the meaning of Sections 201, 301 and
401 of ERISA and therefore meant to be exempt from Parts 2, 3 and 4 of Title I
of ERISA.&#160; All payments pursuant to the
Plan shall be made from the general funds of the Company and no special or
separate fund shall be established or other segregation of assets made to
assure payment. No Participant or other person shall have under any
circumstances any interest in any particular property or assets of the Company
as a result of participating in the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Nonassignability</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Except as specifically set forth in the Plan with respect to the
designation of Beneficiaries, neither a Participant nor any other person shall
have any right to commute, sell, assign, transfer, pledge, anticipate, mortgage
or otherwise encumber, transfer, hypothecate or convey in advance of actual
receipt the amounts, if any, payable hereunder, or </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=463506,FOLIO='16',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">any part thereof, which are, and all rights
to which are, expressly declared to be unassignable and non-transferable.&#160; No part of the amounts payable shall, prior
to actual payment, be subject to seizure or sequestration for the payment of
any debts, judgments, alimony or separate maintenance owed by a Participant or
any other person, nor be transferable by operation of law in the event of a
Participant&#146;s or any other person&#146;s bankruptcy or insolvency.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Validity and Severability</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of this Plan shall
not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision of this Plan,
which shall remain in full force and effect, and any prohibition or
unenforceability in any jurisdiction shall not invalidate or render
unenforceable such provision in any other jurisdiction.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Governing Law</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The validity, interpretation, construction and performance of this Plan
shall in all respects be governed by the laws of the State of Illinois, without
reference to principles of conflict of law, except to the extent preempted by
federal law.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Employment Status</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
This Plan does not constitute a contract of employment or impose on the
Participant or the Company any obligation for the Participant to remain an
employee of the Company or change the status of the Participant&#146;s employment or
the policies of the Company and its affiliates regarding termination of
employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Underlying Incentive Plans and
Programs</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Nothing in this Plan shall prevent the
Company from modifying, amending or terminating the compensation or the
incentive plans and programs pursuant to which Eligible Bonuses or Eligible
Compensation are earned and which are deferred under this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.7</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Successors of the Company</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The rights and obligations of the Company under the Plan shall inure to
the benefit of, and shall be binding upon, the successors and assigns of the
Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.8</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Waiver of Breach</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The waiver by the Company of any breach of any provision of the Plan by
the Participant shall not operate or be construed as a waiver of any subsequent
breach by the Participant.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.9</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notice</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Any notice or filing required or permitted to be given to the Company
under the Plan shall be sufficient if in writing and hand-delivered, or sent by
first class mail to the principal office of the Company, directed to the
attention of the Plan Administrator. Such notice shall be deemed given as of
the date of delivery, or, if delivery is made by mail, as of the date shown on
the postmark.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.10</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Waiver of Notice</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">. Any notice required under the Plan
may be waived by the person entitled to such notice.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.11</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Evidence</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Evidence required of anyone under the Plan may be by certificate,
affidavit, document or other information which the person acting on it
considers pertinent and reliable, and signed, made or presented by the proper
party or parties.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=17,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=762227,FOLIO='17',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.12</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Additional Employers</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">. Subject to the consent of the
Board of Review, any Subsidiary of the Company may adopt the Plan by filing a
written instrument to that effect with the Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.13</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Separation and Distribution
Agreement of 2004</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; The provisions of this <b>Section&nbsp;13.13</b>
shall apply to an Eligible Employee who is a Participant in the Plan and who
transfers from employment with the Company or an Employer to Hospira,&nbsp;Inc.
or to a subsidiary of Hospira,&nbsp;Inc. (collectively, the &#147;Hospira Companies&#148;)
as a result of the transactions contemplated by that certain Separation and
Distribution Agreement by and between Abbott Laboratories and Hospira,&nbsp;Inc.,
dated as of April&nbsp;12, 2004
(the &#147;Distribution Agreement&#148;), and such transfer of employment is made in
accordance with and subject to the terms of the Employee Benefits Agreement as
described in the Distribution Agreement (each such transferred Participant
referred to herein as a &#147;Transferred Hospira Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A Transferred Hospira Participant&#146;s transfer of
employment to the Hospira Companies will not be considered as a termination of
employment as a result of Termination of Employment, Retirement or Disability
for purposes of determining eligibility for distributions under <b>Article&nbsp;VII</b> of the Plan.&#160; Such Transferred Hospira Participant&#146;s
termination of employment resulting from Termination of Employment, Retirement
or Disability shall occur only upon his or her subsequent termination of
employment from the Hospira Companies (and Termination of Employment,
Retirement and Disability with respect to such Transferred Hospira Participants
shall mean such events in relation to the Hospira Companies rather than in
relation to the Company and the Employers);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Following his or her transfer to employment with the
Hospira Companies, a Transferred Hospira Participant will remain a participant
but will not be eligible to make Deferral Elections.&#160; A Transferred Hospira Participant shall
remain a Participant until (i)&nbsp;his or her death or (ii)&nbsp;his or her
Accounts have been distributed in accordance with the Plan and in accordance
with the Transferred Hospira Participant&#146;s elections regarding the manner of
distribution of such Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.14</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Section&nbsp;409A</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
<font face="Times New Roman">To the extent
applicable, it is intended that the Plan comply with the provisions of Code Section&nbsp;409A</font>.&#160; The Plan will be administered and interpreted
in a manner consistent with this intent, and any provision that would cause the
Plan to fail to satisfy Code Section&nbsp;409A will have no force and effect
until amended to comply therewith (which amendment may be retroactive to the
extent permitted by Code Section&nbsp;409A).&#160;
Notwithstanding anything contained herein to the contrary, to the extent
required to avoid accelerated taxation and/or tax penalties under Code Section&nbsp;409A
and applicable guidance issued thereunder, amounts that would otherwise be
payable pursuant to the Plan<b>  </b>during the
six-month period immediately following the Participant&#146;s Termination of
Employment or Retirement shall instead be paid on the first business day after
the date that is six months following the Participant&#146;s Termination of
Employment or Retirement (or upon the Participant&#146;s death, if earlier), plus,
to the extent subject to a six-month delay, a return equal to the Rate of
Return that would be achieved if such amounts were invested in accordance with
the Participant&#146;s Investment Elections under Section&nbsp;4.2 from the
respective dates on which such amounts would otherwise have been paid until the
actual date of payment.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=18,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=475411,FOLIO='18',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 22:53 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Appendix
A</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 1</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Introduction</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Purpose</u>.&#160; The Plan is designed to assist the Employers
in attracting and retaining key employees by providing those employees with the
opportunity to defer the receipt of a portion of their compensation and to have
that deferred compensation treated as if it were invested pending its
distribution by the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>ERISA</u>.&#160; The Plan is intended to be exempt from Parts
2, 3, and 4 of Title I of ERISA and, therefore, participation in the Plan is
limited to a select group of management and highly compensated employees,
within the meaning of Sections 201(2), 301(a)3 and 401(a)(l)&nbsp;of ERISA.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employers</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In addition to the Company, the
participating Employers on the Effective Date are Abbott Laboratories
International Company, Abbott International Ltd., TAP Pharmaceutical Products
Inc., TAP Pharmaceuticals Inc., Abbott Laboratories Inc., Murex Diagnostics,&nbsp;Inc.,
TAP Finance Inc., Perclose Inc., Abbott BioResearch Center,&nbsp;Inc., and
Knoll Pharmaceutical Corporation.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">After the Effective Date, any other
Subsidiary of the Company may adopt the Plan with the Company&#146;s consent as
described in <b>Section&nbsp;13.12</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Employer shall be liable to the
Company for an amount equal to the Plan benefits earned by its Eligible
Employees. Where an Eligible Employee has been employed by more than one
Employer, the Plan Administrator shall allocate the liability to the Company
associated with that Eligible Employee&#146;s Plan benefits among his or her
Employers. The Plan Administrator shall establish procedures for determining
the time at which and manner in which the Employers shall pay this liability to
the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Effective Date</u>.&#160; The Plan&#146;s &#147;Effective Date&#148; is January&nbsp;1,
2002.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=19,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=1047769,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:34 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 2</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Definitions</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">When used in this Plan, unless the context
clearly requires a different meaning, the following words and terms shall have
the meanings set forth below. Whenever appropriate, words used in the singular
shall be deemed to include the plural, and <i>vice versa</i>, and
the masculine gender shall be deemed to include the feminine gender.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Account</u>.&#160; &#147;Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established
for record keeping purposes for each Participant pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;6</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Base Salary</u>.&#160; &#147;Base Salary&#148; means the Participant&#146;s annual
base rate of pay from an Employer (excluding Eligible Bonuses, all other
bonuses, commissions, relocation expenses, and other non-regular forms of
compensation) before deductions for (i)&nbsp;Deferral Elections made pursuant
to <b>Section&nbsp;4.1</b> or (ii)&nbsp;contributions
made on the Participant&#146;s behalf to any Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan or to any
cafeteria plan under Section&nbsp;125 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
amended (the &#147;Code&#148;) maintained by an Employer.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Beneficiary</u>.&#160; &#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the person, persons or
entity designated by the Participant to receive any benefits payable under the
Plan pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;9</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Board of Review</u>.
&#147;Board of Review&#148; means the Abbott Laboratories Employee Benefit Board of
Review appointed and acting under the Abbott Laboratories Annuity Retirement
Plan and having the powers and duties described in this Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Company</u>.&#160; &#147;Company&#148; means Abbott Laboratories, its successors,
any organization into which or with which Abbott Laboratories may merge or
consolidate or to which all or substantially all of its assets may be
transferred.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral
Election</u>.&#160; &#147;Deferral Election&#148; means
an election under the Plan by a Participant to defer the receipt of a portion
of his or her Eligible Compensation made on a Deferral Election Form.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral
Election Form</u>.&#160; &#147;Deferral Election
Form&#148; means the form provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.1</b> on which the Participant makes his or her
Deferral Election.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral Account</u>.&#160; &#147;Deferral Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established
for record keeping purposes for each Participant&#146;s Deferral Election pursuant
to <b>Section&nbsp;6.1</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Disability</u>.&#160; &#147;Disability&#148; means eligibility for disability
benefits under the terms of the Abbott Laboratories Extended Disability Plan (&#147;EDP&#148;)
or, for a Participant whose Employer does not participate in the EDP, such
similar plan, providing long term or extended disability benefits, in which his
or her Employer participates.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Distribution Election
Form</u>.&#160; &#147;Distribution Election Form&#148;
means the form provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b> on which the Participant specifies </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=20,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=325598,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:34 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the time at
which the amounts credited to one of the Participant&#146;s Account(s)&nbsp;are to
be distributed and their method of payment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Early Distribution</u>.
&#147;Early Distribution&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;8.5</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Eligible Bonus</u>.&#160; &#147;Eligible Bonus&#148; means an annual cash
incentive bonus for a Plan Year that the Plan Administrator, or its delegate,
has designated as being eligible for deferral under this Plan. As of the
Effective Date, cash bonuses paid under the following plans have been
designated as being eligible for deferral under the Plan: the Abbott
Laboratories Cash Profit Sharing Plan, the Abbott Laboratories Divisional
Incentive Plan, and the Abbott Laboratories Management Incentive Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Eligible Compensation</u>.&#160; &#147;Eligible Compensation&#148; means the Participant&#146;s
Base Salary and Eligible Bonuses.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Eligible Employee</u>.&#160; &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means any person employed
by an Employer who is both</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;text-justify:inter-ideograph;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
United States employee or an expatriate who is based and paid in the United
States, and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;text-justify:inter-ideograph;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;text-justify:inter-ideograph;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>shown
as having a grade level of 20 or higher on his or her Employer&#146;s Human Resource
System</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;text-justify:inter-ideograph;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and who is not (i)&nbsp;an officer of the
Company, (ii)&nbsp;an individual who provides services to an Employer under a
contract, arrangement or understanding with either the individual directly or
with an agency or leasing organization that treats the individual as either an
independent contractor or an employee of such agency or leasing organization,
even if such individual is subsequently determined (by an Employer, the
Internal Revenue Service, any other governmental agency, judicial action, or
otherwise) to have been a common law employee of an Employer rather than an
independent contractor or employee of such agency or leasing organization, or (iii)&nbsp;any
Employee who is employed by an Employer located in Puerto Rico, other than any
person designated as a &#147;U.S. Expatriate&#148; on the records of an Employer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For all Plan purposes, an individual shall be
an &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; for any Plan Year only if during that Plan Year an
Employer treats that individual as its employee for purposes of employment
taxes and wage withholding for Federal income taxes, even if such individual is
subsequently determined (by an Employer, the Internal Revenue Service, any
other governmental agency, judicial action, or otherwise) to have been a common
law employee of an Employer in that Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employer</u>.&#160; &#147;Employer&#148; shall mean the Company, the
participating Employers on the Effective Date, and any Subsidiary of the
Company that subsequently adopts the Plan in the manner provided in <b>Section&nbsp;13.12</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employer Contribution</u>.&#160; &#147;Employer Contribution&#148; means the
contribution deemed to have been made by an Employer pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;5.1</b>.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=21,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=543705,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:34 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.17</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employer Contribution
Account</u>.&#160; &#147;Employer Contribution
Account(s)&#148; means the account(s)&nbsp;established for record keeping purposes
for each Participant&#146;s Employer Contributions pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;6.l</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan</u>.&#160; &#147;Employer 401(k)&nbsp;Plan&#148; means any defined
contribution retirement plan that is maintained by an Employer, qualified under
Section&nbsp;401(a)&nbsp;of the Code, and includes a cash or deferred
arrangement under Code Section&nbsp;401(k). The term shall specifically
include, but not be limited to, the Abbott Laboratories 401(k)&nbsp;Plan and
the Abbott Laboratories Stock Retirement Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.19</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>ERISA</u>.&#160; &#147;ERISA&#148; means the Employee Retirement Income
Security Act of 1974, as amended.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.20</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Hardship Distribution</u>.&#160; &#147;Hardship Distribution&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;8.4</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.21</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>In-Service
Distribution</u>.&#160; &#147;In-Service
Distribution&#148; is defined in <b>Section&nbsp;4.3</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.22</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Investment Fund(s)</u>.&#160; &#147;Investment Fund(s)&#148; means one or more of the
funds selected by the Plan Administrator pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.23</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Investment Election
Form</u>.&#160; &#147;Investment Election Form&#148;
means the form provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.2</b> on which the Participant specifies the
Investment Funds in which the Participant&#146;s Account(s)&nbsp;are to be deemed to
be invested.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.24</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Participant</u>.&#160; &#147;Participant&#148; means any Eligible Employee who
elects to participate in this Plan by filing a Deferral Election, Investment
Fund Election, and Distribution Election as provided in <b>Article&nbsp;4</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.25</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Plan</u>.&#160; &#147;Plan&#148; means the Abbott Laboratories Deferred
Compensation Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.26</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Plan Administrator</u>.
&#147;Plan Administrator&#148; means the Board of Review.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.27</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Plan Year</u>.&#160; &#147;Plan Year&#148; means a twelve-month period
beginning January&nbsp;1 and ending the following December&nbsp;31.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.28</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Rate of Return</u>.&#160; &#147;Rate of Return&#148; means, for each Investment
Fund, an amount equal to the net gain or net loss (expressed as a percentage)
on the assets of that Investment Fund.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.29</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Retirement</u>.&#160; &#147;Retirement&#148; means the retirement of a
Participant from an Employer under the Abbott Laboratories Annuity Retirement
Plan or any other pension or defined benefit pension plan of the Company or an
Employer, including for this purpose the Abbott Laboratories Pension for Former
BASF Employees.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.30</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Subsidiary</u>.&#160; &#147;Subsidiary&#148; shall mean any corporation,
limited liability company, partnership, joint venture, or business trust
organized in the United States 50 percent or more of the voting stock of which
is owed, directly or indirectly, by the Company.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=22,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=29629,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:34 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.31</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination of
Employment</u>.&#160; &#147;Termination of Employment&#148;
means the cessation of a Participant&#146;s services as an employee of the Company,
whether voluntary or involuntary, for any reason other than Retirement,
Disability or death.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.32</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Unforeseeable
Emergency</u>.&#160; &#147;Unforeseeable Emergency&#146;&#146;
means severe financial hardship to the Participant resulting from a sudden and
unexpected illness or accident of the Participant or a dependent of the
Participant, loss of the Participant&#146;s property due to casualty, or other
similar extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances arising as a result of
events beyond the control of the Participant as determined by the Plan
Administrator.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 3</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participation</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Participation</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Except as provided in <b>Sections 3.1(a)&nbsp;</b>and <b>(c)</b>,
an Eligible Employee may become a Participant by making a Deferral Election,
Investment Fund Election, and Distribution Election pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;4</b> on or before the deadline set by the Plan
Administrator pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.4</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A newly Eligible Employee may become
a Participant by making a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election, and
Distribution Election pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;4</b>
within thirty (30) days of his or her date of hire by an Employer and deferrals
shall commence as soon as practical thereafter. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
an individual who becomes a newly Eligible Employee as a result of a job
promotion or transfer may not begin to participate in the Plan until the Plan
Year next following such promotion or transfer.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">If a Participant revokes his or her
Deferral Election for a Plan Year pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;4.l(d)</b>,
then that Participant may not make a Deferral Election for the following Plan
Year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination of
Participation</u>.&#160; Participant who
ceases to be an Eligible Employee will remain a Participant but may no longer
make Deferral Elections. A Participant shall remain a Participant until (i)&nbsp;his
or her death or (ii)&nbsp;his or her Accounts have been distributed.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 4</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Election Forms</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral
Elections</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Participants shall make their
Deferral Elections mutually on a form provided by the Plan Administrator (a &#147;Defend
Election Form&#148;). Each Deferral Election shall apply to only a single Plan Year.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=23,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=993605,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:34 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">On his or her Deferral Election
Form, the Participant shall specify the amount (expressed as a percentage) of
his or her Base Salary and the amount (also expressed as a percentage) of his
or her Eligible Bonuses that the Participant elects to defer for that Plan Year
together with such other information as the Plan Administrator may, in its sole
and absolute discretion, require.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>
