<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Nonassignability</u>.&#160; Except as specifically set forth in the Plan
with respect to the designation of Beneficiaries, neither a Participant nor any
other person shall have any right to commute, sell, assign, transfer, pledge,
anticipate, mortgage or otherwise encumber, transfer, hypothecate or convey in
advance of actual receipt the amounts, if any, payable hereunder, or any part
thereof, which are, and all rights to which are, expressly declared to be
unassignable and nontransferable. No part of the amounts payable shall, prior
to actual payment, be subject to seizure or sequestration for the payment of
any debts, judgments, alimony or separate maintenance owed by a Participant or
any other person, nor be transferable by operation of law in the event of a
Participant&#146;s or any other person&#146;s bankruptcy or insolvency.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Validity
and Severability</u>.&#160; The invalidity or
unenforceability of any provision of this Plan shall not affect the validity or
enforceability of any other provision of this Plan, which shall remain in full
force and effect, and any prohibition or unenforceability in any jurisdiction
shall not invalidate or render unenforceable such provision in any other
jurisdiction.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Governing
Law</u>.&#160; The validity, interpretation,
construction and performance of this Plan shall in all respects be governed by
the laws of the State of Illinois, without reference to principles of conflict
of law, except to the extent preempted by federal law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Employment
Status</u>.&#160; This Plan does not
constitute a contract of employment or impose on the Participant or the Company
any obligation for the Participant to remain an employee of the Company or
change the status of the Participant&#146;s employment or the policies of the Company
and its affiliates regarding termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Underlying
Incentive Plans and Promotion</u>.&#160;
Nothing in this Plan shall prevent the Company from modifying, amending
or terminating the compensation or the incentive plans and programs pursuant to
which Eligible Bonuses or Eligible Compensation are earned and which are
deferred under this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Successors
of the Company</u>.&#160; The rights and
obligations of the Company under the Plan shall inure to the benefit of, and
shall be binding upon, the successors and assigns of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Waiver
of Breach</u>.&#160; The waiver by the Company
of any breach of any provision of the Plan by the Participant shall not operate
or be construed as a waiver of any subsequent breach by the Participant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Notice</u>.&#160; Any notice or filing required or permitted to
be given to the Company under the Plan shall be sufficient if in writing and
hand-delivered, or sent by first class mail to the principal office of the
Company, directed to the attention of the Plan Administrator. Such notice shall
be deemed given as of the date of delivery, or, if delivery is made by mail, as
of the date shown on the postmark.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=33,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=147195,FOLIO='15',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-07_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:37 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Waiver
of Notice</u>.&#160; Any notice required under
the Plan may be waived by the person entitled to such notice.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.11&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Evidence</u>.&#160; Evidence required of anyone under the Plan
may be by certificate, affidavit, document or other information which the
person acting on it considers pertinent and reliable, and signed, made or
presented by the proper party or parties.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.12&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Additional
Employers</u>.&#160; Subject to the consent of
the Board of Review, any Subsidiary of the Company may adopt the Plan by filing
a written instrument to that effect with the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Separation
and Distribution Agreement of 2004</u>.&#160;
Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan to the contrary but
subject to the provisions of this <b>Section&nbsp;13.13</b>,
if an Eligible Employee who is a Participant in the Plan transfers from
employment with the Company or an Employer to Hospira,&nbsp;Inc. or to a
subsidiary of Hospira,&nbsp;Inc. (collectively, the &#147;Hospira Companies&#148;) as a
result of the transactions contemplated by that certain Separation and
Distribution Agreement by and between Abbott Laboratories and Hospira,&nbsp;Inc.,
dated as of April&nbsp;12, 2004
(the &#147;Distribution Agreement&#148;), and such transfer of employment is made in
accordance with and subject to the terms of the Employee Benefits Agreement as
described in the Distribution Agreement (each such transferred Participant
referred to herein as a &#147;Transferred Hospira Participant&#148;), then the following
provisions shall apply to each such Transferred Hospira Participant:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A
Transferred Hospira Participant&#146;s transfer of employment to the Hospira
Companies will not be considered as a termination of employment as a result of
Termination of Employment, Retirement or Disability for purposes of determining
eligibility for distributions under <b>Article&nbsp;8</b>
of the Plan. &#160;Such Transferred Hospira
Participant&#146;s termination of employment resulting from Termination of
Employment, Retirement or Disability shall occur only upon his or her
subsequent termination of employment from the Hospira Companies (and
Termination of Employment, Retirement and Disability with respect to such
Transferred Hospira Participants shall mean such events in relation to the
Hospira Companies rather than in relation to the Company and the Employers);</p>

<p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Following
his or her transfer to employment with the Hospira Companies, a Transferred
Hospira Participant will remain a Participant but may no longer make Deferral
Elections.&#160; A Transferred Hospira
Participant shall remain a Participant until (i)&nbsp;his or her death or (ii)&nbsp;his
or her Accounts have been distributed in accordance with the Plan and in
accordance with the Transferred Hospira Participant&#146;s elections regarding the
manner of distribution of such Accounts.</p>

<p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
the foregoing provisions of this <b>Section&nbsp;13.13</b>,
a Participant who will transfer to employment with the Hospira Companies on the
Distribution Date may elect, prior to the Distribution Date as defined in the
Distribution Agreement, to have his or her transfer of</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=34,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="2",CHK=704449,FOLIO='16',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KE-07_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 21 01:37 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">employment treated as a
termination of employment with the Company and the Employer, in which case such
Participant will be treated as having a Termination of Employment on the
Distribution Date and his or her Accounts will be distributed in accordance
with <b>Article&nbsp;8</b>; provided, however, that
such Accounts shall be distributed as soon as practicable following the
one-year anniversary of the Distribution Date.&#160;
Any election made by a Participant in accordance with this <b>Section&nbsp;13.13(c)&nbsp;</b>shall be made in such form and at
such time as required by the Plan Administrator.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<FILENAME>a2188623zex-10_2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.2
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.2</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amended
and Restated effective</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">January&nbsp;1,
2008</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES 401(K)&nbsp;SUPPLEMENTAL PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;1</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PURPOSE.&#160; This Abbott
Laboratories 401(k)&nbsp;Supplemental Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) is being established by
Abbott Laboratories (&#147;Abbott&#148;) to provide eligible management employees of
Abbott an opportunity to accumulate capital for their retirement or other
termination of employment in excess of the contributions allowed under the
Abbott Laboratories Stock Retirement Plan (&#147;Stock Plan&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>EFFECTIVE DATE; GRANDFATHERED AMOUNTS.&#160;
The Plan became effective as of October&nbsp;1, 1993 and is hereby
amended and restated, effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2008, in accordance with
the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A (&#147;Code Section&nbsp;409A&#148;) of the
Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the &#147;Code&#148;).&#160; Notwithstanding anything in the Plan to the
contrary, any amounts under the Plan that were earned and vested before January&nbsp;1,
2005 (as determined in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;409A) with respect to
participants who retired before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;)
shall be subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan as administered and as
in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2004, provided that the provisions of the Plan,
as amended effective December&nbsp;9, 2005 in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;409A,
shall also apply to Grandfathered Amounts.&#160;
Except as expressly provided above or elsewhere herein, amendments made
to the Plan pursuant to this amendment and restatement or otherwise shall not
affect the Grandfathered Amounts.&#160; The
terms and conditions applicable to the Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;A
attached hereto.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1-3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ADMINISTRATION.&#160; The Plan shall
be administered by the Compensation Committee (the &#147;Committee&#148;) appointed by
the Board of Directors of Abbott (the &#147;Board of Directors&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;2</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ELIGIBILITY
AND PARTICIPATION</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PERSONS ELIGIBLE TO PARTICIPATE.&#160;
Participation in the Plan shall be limited to employees who are serving
as corporate officers of Abbott as of October&nbsp;1, 1993 or who become
corporate officers thereafter. The term &#147;corporate officer&#148; for purposes of the
Plan shall mean an individual elected an officer of Abbott by its Board of
Directors (or designated as such for purposes of the Plan by the Committee),
but shall not include assistant officers. In the event an employee should cease
to be a corporate officer of Abbott due to demotion or otherwise while
remaining in the employ of Abbott, (a)&nbsp;such employee&#146;s elective deferral
in effect for such year shall remain irrevocable, (b)&nbsp;Abbott&#146;s matching
contributions under Section&nbsp;4 shall immediately cease and (c)&nbsp;such
employee shall no longer be eligible to participate in the Plan as of the end
of such calendar year.&#160; In the event an
employee should cease to be a corporate officer of Abbott due to termination of
employment, such employee shall cease to be eligible to</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=794180,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">participate in the Plan and
any contributions then being made on behalf of such employee shall immediately
cease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PARTICIPANT.&#160; An eligible
employee may elect to participate in the Plan by electing to have contributions
made on the employee&#146;s behalf as provided in Section&nbsp;5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;3</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EMPLOYEE
CONTRIBUTIONS</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ALLOWABLE CONTRIBUTIONS.&#160; An
eligible employee may elect to have his employer make &#147;pre-tax contributions&#148;
on his behalf in an amount not greater than 18% in total of his compensation in
any calendar year for services rendered to his employer. A pre-tax contribution
made by an employer on behalf of a participant shall reduce the participant&#146;s
compensation at the time of payment of such compensation. Each election
hereunder shall be in writing, and shall be in multiples of 1% of compensation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>COMPENSATION.&#160; A participant&#146;s &#147;compensation&#148;
shall have the same meaning as that term is used in subsection 7-2 of the Stock
Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3-3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>MAXIMUM EMPLOYEE CONTRIBUTIONS.&#160;
Notwithstanding subsection 3-1, in no event shall the sum of:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the participant&#146;s total contributions, pre-tax contributions,
supplemental deposits and supplemental pre-tax contributions made under the
Stock Plan; plus</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the participant&#146;s total pre-tax contributions made under the Plan;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">for any calendar year,
exceed 18% of the employee&#146;s compensation for such year.&#160; In the event the limitation described in this
subsection 3-3 would be exceeded for any participant, the participant&#146;s pre-tax
contributions made under this Plan shall be reduced until the limit is not
exceeded.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3-4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CHANGE IN STOCK PLAN.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in Sections 3-1 and
3-3 above, no action or inaction by an employee under the Stock Plan may result
in a change in amounts contributed to the Plan in excess of the limit with
respect to elective deferrals under Section&nbsp;402(g)(1)(A), (B)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;of
the Code in effect for the year in which the action or inaction occurs.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;4</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EMPLOYER
CONTRIBUTIONS</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the calendar year ending
December&nbsp;31, 1993, and for each subsequent calendar year, Abbott shall
make a contribution on behalf of each participant in the Plan who makes pre-tax
contributions (&#147;basic contributions&#148;) under the Plan during such year at the
rate of two percent (2%) of compensation in excess of, for calendar year 1993,
Two Hundred Thousand Dollars ($200,000), and for calendar years subsequent to
1993, the limit in effect for such year under Code Section&nbsp;40l(a)(17).
Such employer contribution shall be in an amount equal to the contribution the
participant would have received under subsection 8-3 of the Stock Plan with</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=828564,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">respect to such basic
contributions had such basic contributions been made under subsection 7-1 of
the Stock Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To the extent applicable, a
contribution made by a participant under subsection 5-4 shall be considered a
basic contribution for purposes of this Section&nbsp;4 to the extent it
includes contributions at the rate of two percent (2%) of compensation for 1993
in excess of Two Hundred Thousand Dollars ($200,000).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;5</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ELECTIONS</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ANNUAL ELECTIONS REQUIRED.&#160;
Except as provided in Section&nbsp;5-3, a participant shall elect to
make pre-tax contributions with respect to compensation earned in any calendar
year on or prior to December&nbsp;31<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">st</font>&#160;of the prior calendar year.&#160; Each such election shall be in writing, shall
be filed with the Committee, shall be effective only for the calendar year for
which made and shall be irrevocable.&#160; An
employee who fails to make a timely election under this subsection 5-1 for a
calendar year may not contribute to the Plan during the following year.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>[Section&nbsp;intentionally omitted.]</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5-3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NEWLY ELIGIBLE AND NEWLY HIRED EMPLOYEES.&#160; A newly hired corporate officer described in Section&nbsp;2-1
shall become eligible to participate in the Plan on the first day of the month
next following the month after the individual&#146;s date of hire; <u>provided</u>,
that in no event may such individual begin to participate in the Plan later
than 90 days following his or her date of hire.&#160;
An eligible employee described in the preceding sentence (who was not
eligible to participate in any other plan that would be aggregated with the
Plan under Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(c)) shall make the election described
in Section&nbsp;5-1 within thirty (30) days of the date on which he first
becomes eligible under the Plan.&#160; Any
such election shall become effective for compensation earned no earlier than
the first payroll period commencing after receipt of the election by the
Committee and shall be irrevocable for the remainder of the calendar year.&#160; Any other newly eligible employee shall make
the election described in Section&nbsp;5-1 no later than December&nbsp;31<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">st</font>&#160;of the year in which such
employee first becomes eligible under the Plan.&#160;
Any such election shall become effective for compensation earned in the
calendar year following the year in which the election is made.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5-4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SPECIAL CONTRIBUTION FOR 1993.&#160;
Employees who are serving as corporate officers of Abbott and who have
established &#147;Grantor Trusts&#148; under the 1986 Abbott Laboratories Management
Incentive Plan (&#147;MIP&#148;) as of October&nbsp;1, 1993, may elect to make a lump-sum
contribution based on compensation earned during the period of January&nbsp;1,
1993 through September&nbsp;30, 1993 (the &#147;Make-Up Period&#148;) by filing an
election with the Administrator and tendering payment in cash to such Grantor
Trust of the amount of the contribution, not later than October&nbsp;31,
1993.&#160; Any such contribution shall not
exceed the maximum contribution allowed under subsection 3-3 based on the
employee&#146;s Stock Plan contributions made, and compensation earned, during the
Make-Up Period.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5-5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>GRANTOR TRUST ELECTION.&#160; At the
time of the annual elections described in subsection 5-1, each participant may
elect to have his pre-tax and employer contributions for the following year
deposited in a &#147;Grantor Trust&#148; established by the participant under the</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=743619,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">circumstances and on the
terms described in subsection 6-1, rather than defer such contributions under
subsection 5-1.&#160; Any such election shall
be irrevocable and shall apply to all pre-tax contributions made during, and employer
contributions made for, such calendar year on behalf of such participant.&#160; If the participant fails to make an election
under this subsection 5-5, the participant&#146;s pre-tax contributions made during,
and employer contribution made for, such calendar year shall be retained by
Abbott and shall not be deposited in a Grantor Trust in the future.&#160; In no event shall such contributions be paid
to the Grantor Trust later than the last day of the &#147;applicable 2 &#189; month
period&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167;&nbsp;1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;6</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FUNDING
EMPLOYER AND EMPLOYEE CONTRIBUTIONS</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CONTRIBUTIONS TO BE DEPOSITED IN GRANTOR TRUSTS.&#160; Each participant&#146;s pre-tax contributions and
employer contributions which the participant has filed an election under
subsection 5-5 shall be deposited in a &#147;Grantor Trust&#148; established by the
participant, as described in subsection 6-3, provided such trust is in a form
which the Committee determines is substantially similar to the trust attached
to this Plan as Exhibit&nbsp;B.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CONTRIBUTIONS TO BE RETAINED BY ABBOTT.&#160;
Each participant&#146;s pre-tax contributions and employer contributions for
which the participant has not filed an election under subsection 5-5 shall be
retained by Abbott and credited to a Deferred Account established under
subsection 7-1.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>AFTER ESTABLISHMENT OF GRANTOR TRUST.&#160;
After a Grantor Trust has been established by a participant under
subsection 6-1, all pre-tax contributions and employer contributions made
thereafter for which the participant has filed an election under subsection
5-5, shall be deposited in such Grantor Trust (less the aggregate federal,
state and local individual income and employment taxes (determined under
subsection 8-5) attributable to such contributions). Such deposits shall be
made as soon as practicable after the last complete payroll period of the
calendar quarter in which the contributions are made.&#160; The appropriate aggregate federal, state and
local individual income and employment taxes attributable to the contributions
shall be paid directly to the participant.&#160;
In no event shall such contributions be paid to the Grantor Trust or the
participant later than the last day of the &#147;applicable 2 &#189; month period&#148;, as
such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>[Section&nbsp;intentionally omitted.]</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ELIMINATION OF GRANTOR TRUST FUNDING THRESHOLD.&#160; Notwithstanding anything contained in the
Plan to the contrary, effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2005, the Grantor Trust
established by the participant shall be funded in accordance with the
requirements of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
amended.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6-6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>UTILIZATION OF TRANSITION RELIEF UNDER SECTION&nbsp;409A OF THE
CODE.&#160; Notwithstanding anything contained
in the Plan to the contrary, pursuant to Q&amp;A-20 of Internal Revenue Service
Notice 2005-1 (the &#147;Notice&#148;), Abbott shall cause the amount of all pre-tax and
employer contributions and all associated earnings, including guaranteed rate
payments, for the periods ended on or prior to December&nbsp;31, 2005 for each
participant who has made a</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=389422,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Grantor Trust election under
subsection 5-5, to the extent not previously contributed to a Grantor Trust
established by the participant, to be deposited in such Grantor Trust on or
prior to December&nbsp;31, 2005.&#160; Such
contribution is intended to result in a partial termination of participation in
the Plan as permitted by the Notice.&#160;
Each participant who has established a Grantor Trust and who receives
such contribution shall include the full amount of such Grantor Trust
contribution in the participant&#146;s income in 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;7</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ACCOUNTING</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SEPARATE ACCOUNTS.&#160; The Committee
shall establish accounts for participants who have made elections pursuant to
subsection 5-1 or 5-5 as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Committee shall maintain a &#147;Deferred Account&#148; in the name of each
participant who has elected to defer payment of all or a portion of his or her
pre-tax contributions under subsection 5-1.&#160;
The Deferred Account shall be comprised of any pre-tax contributions
made on behalf of the participant under subsection 3-1 and any other
allocations made on behalf of the participant under Section&nbsp;4, in each
case, for which the participant has not made an election under subsection 5-5,
and any adjustments made pursuant to subsection 7-2.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Committee shall maintain two separate Accounts, a &#147;Pre-Tax Account&#148;
and an &#147;After-Tax Account&#148;, in the name of each participant who has declined to
defer allocations by electing to have a portion of his or her pre-tax and
employer contributions deposited in cash to a Grantor Trust according to
subsection 5-5.&#160; The Pre-Tax Account
shall consist of the aggregate of all pre-tax contributions contemplated by
subsection 3-1, whether deposited to the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust or made in
cash to the participant, and any adjustments in accordance with subsection
7-3.&#160; The After-Tax Account shall consist
of employer contributions deposited to the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust in cash
according to subsection 5-5 and any adjustments made in accordance with
subsection 7-4.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ADJUSTMENT OF DEFERRED ACCOUNTS.&#160;
No later than as of the end of each calendar year, each participant&#146;s
Deferred Account shall be adjusted by the Committee as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FIRST, reduced by an amount equal to any distribution made to the
participant during that year pursuant to subsections 7-11 or 7-12;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NEXT, increased by an amount equal to any pre-tax contributions and
employer contributions made on behalf of such participant for that year for
which the participant has not made an election under subsection 5-5; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FINALLY, increased by an amount equal to the Interest earned for that
year pursuant to subsection 7-5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ADJUSTMENT OF PRE-TAX ACCOUNTS.&#160;
No later than as of the end of each calendar year, each participant&#146;s
Pre-Tax Account shall be adjusted by the Committee as follows:</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=188126,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FIRST, reduced, in any year in which the participant is entitled to
receive a distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, by an amount equal to the
distribution that would have been made to the participant if the aggregate
amounts allocated according to subsection 5-5 had instead been deferred under
subsection 5-1;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NEXT, increased by an amount equal to any pre-tax contributions and
employer contributions made on behalf of the participant for that year that are
paid to the participant (including any contributions paid to the participant&#146;s
Grantor Trust) according to subsection 5-5;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FINALLY, increased by an amount equal to the Interest earned for that
year pursuant to subsection 7-5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ADJUSTMENT OF AFTER-TAX ACCOUNTS.&#160;
No later than as of the end of each calendar year, each participant&#146;s
After-Tax Account shall be adjusted by the Committee as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FIRST, reduced, in any year in which the participant is in receipt of a
benefit distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, by an amount calculated as
provided by subsection 7-16 which represents the distribution for such year;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NEXT, increased by an amount equal to any pre-tax contributions and
employer contributions made on behalf of the participant for that year that are
deposited in the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust according to subsection 5-5;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FINALLY, increased by an amount equal to the After-Tax Interest earned
for that year pursuant to subsection 7-5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>INTEREST ACCRUALS ON ACCOUNTS.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No later than as of the end of each calendar year, a participant&#146;s
Deferred Account or Pre-Tax Account, as applicable, shall be credited with
interest (&#147;Interest&#148;) at the following rate:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the average of the &#147;prime rate&#148; of interest published by the Wall
Street Journal (Mid-West Edition) or comparable successor quotation service on
the first business day of January&nbsp;and the last business day of each month
of the calendar year; plus</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>two hundred twenty-five (225) basis points.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No later than as of the end of each calendar year, a participant&#146;s
After-Tax Account shall be credited with the amount of Interest set forth
above, multiplied by the aggregate of the federal, state and local individual
income tax rates determined in accordance with subsection 8-5 (the &#147;After-Tax
Interest&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Interest and After-Tax Interest, as applicable, shall be credited
on the conditions established by the Committee.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=802740,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>GUARANTEED RATE PAYMENTS.&#160; In
addition to any employer contribution made on behalf of a participant for any
calendar year pursuant to section 4, Abbott shall also make a payment to a
participant&#146;s Grantor Trust (a &#147;Guaranteed Rate Payment&#148;) for each year in
which the Grantor Trust is in effect.&#160;
The Guaranteed Payment shall equal the excess, if any, of&#160; the participant&#146;s &#147;Net Interest Accrual&#148; (as
defined below) over the net earnings of the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust for the
year, and shall be paid within the thirty (30) days beginning April&nbsp;1 of
the following calendar year. A participant&#146;s Net Interest Accrual for a year is
an amount equal to: the After-Tax Interest credited to the participant&#146;s
After-Tax Account for that year in accordance with subsection 7-5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>GRANTOR TRUST ASSETS.&#160; Each
participant&#146;s Grantor Trust assets shall be invested solely in the instruments
specified by investment guidelines established by the Committee.&#160; Such investment guidelines, once established,
may be changed by the Committee, provided that any change shall not take effect
until the year following the year in which the change is made and provided
further that the instruments specified shall be consistent with the provisions
of Section&nbsp;3(b)&nbsp;of the form of Grantor Trust attached hereto as
Attachment A.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>DESIGNATION OF BENEFICIARIES.&#160;
Subject to the conditions and limitations set forth below, each
participant, and after a participant&#146;s death, each primary beneficiary
designated by a participant in accordance with the provisions of this
subsection 7-6, shall have the right from time to time to designate a primary
beneficiary or beneficiaries and, successive or contingent beneficiary or
beneficiaries to receive unpaid amounts from the participant&#146;s Deferred Account
under the Plan.&#160; Beneficiaries may be a
natural person or persons or a fiduciary, such as a trustee of a trust or the
legal representative of an estate.&#160; Any such
designation shall take effect upon the death of the participant or such
beneficiary, as the case may be, or in the case of any fiduciary beneficiary,
upon the termination of all of its duties (other than the duty to dispose of
the right to receive amounts remaining to be paid under the Plan).&#160; The conditions and limitations relating to
the designation of beneficiaries are as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A nonfiduciary beneficiary shall have the right to designate a further
beneficiary or beneficiaries only if the original participant or the next
preceding primary beneficiary, as the case may be, shall have expressly so
provided in writing; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A fiduciary beneficiary shall designate as a further beneficiary or
beneficiaries only those persons or other fiduciaries who are entitled to
receive the amounts payable from the participant&#146;s account under the trust or
estate of which it is a fiduciary.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any beneficiary designation
or grant of any power to any beneficiary under this subsection may be exercised
only by an instrument in writing, executed by the person making the designation
or granting such power and filed with the Secretary of Abbott during such
person&#146;s lifetime or prior to the termination of a fiduciary&#146;s duties.&#160; If a deceased participant or a deceased
nonfiduciary beneficiary who had the right to designate a beneficiary as
provided above dies without having designated a further beneficiary, or if no
beneficiary designated as provided above is living or qualified and acting, the
Committee, in its discretion, may direct distribution of the amount remaining
from time to time to either:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=700931,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any one or more or all of the next of kin (including the surviving
spouse) of the participant or the deceased beneficiary, as the case may be, and
in such proportions as the Committee determines; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>the legal representative of the estate of the deceased participant or
deceased beneficiary as the case may be.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NON-ASSIGNABILITY AND FACILITY OF PAYMENT.&#160; Amounts payable to participants and their
beneficiaries under the Plan are not in any way subject to their debts and
other obligations, and may not be voluntarily or involuntarily sold,
transferred or assigned; provided that the preceding provisions of this section
shall not be construed as restricting in any way a designation right granted to
a beneficiary pursuant to the terms of subsection 7-6.&#160; When a participant or the beneficiary of a
participant is under legal disability, or in the Committee&#146;s opinion is in any
way incapacitated so as to be unable to manage his or her financial affairs,
the Committee may direct that payments shall be made to the participant&#146;s or
beneficiary&#146;s legal representative, or to a relative or friend of the
participant or beneficiary for the benefit of the participant or beneficiary,
or the Committee may direct the payment or distribution for the benefit of the
participant or beneficiary in any manner that the Committee determines.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PAYER OF AMOUNTS ALLOCATED TO PARTICIPANTS.&#160; Any employer contribution made on behalf of a
participant in the Plan and any interest credited with respect thereto will be
paid by the employer (or such employer&#146;s successor) by whom the participant was
employed during the calendar year for which any amount was contributed, and for
that purpose, if a participant shall have been employed by two or more
employers during any calendar year the amount allocated under this Plan for
that year shall be an obligation of each of the respective employers in
proportion to the respective amounts of compensation paid by each of them in
that calendar year.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>MANNER OF PAYMENT OF DEFERRED ACCOUNTS.&#160;
Subject to subsection 7-12, a participant shall elect to receive payment
of his Deferred Account in substantially equal annual installments over a
minimum period of ten years, or a longer period, at the time of his election
for such calendar year under subsection 5-1.&#160;
Payment of a participant&#146;s Deferred Account shall commence on the first
business day of January&nbsp;of the year following the year in which the
participant incurs a termination of employment.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PAYMENT UPON TERMINATION FOLLOWING CHANGE IN CONTROL. Notwithstanding
any other provision of the Plan, if a participant incurs a termination of
employment with Abbott and its subsidiaries for any reason within two (2)&nbsp;years
following the date of a Change in Control, provided that the event constituting
a Change in Control is also a &#147;change in control event&#148;, as such term is
defined in Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.409A-3(i)(5): (a)&nbsp;with respect to a
participant whose contributions under the Plan are deferred in accordance with
subsection 5-1, the aggregate unpaid balance of the participant&#146;s Deferred
Account shall be paid to such participant in a lump sum within thirty (30) days
following the date of such termination of employment, and (b)&nbsp;with respect
to a participant whose contributions under the Plan are made pursuant to
subsection 5-5, (i)&nbsp;the aggregate of the participant&#146;s unpaid
contributions under subsection 5-5 (if any) for the fiscal year in which the
termination occurs and (ii)&nbsp;a pro rata portion of the unpaid Guaranteed
Rate Payment under subsection 7-6 attributable to the portion of the year
elapsed prior to the date of termination, shall be paid to such participant&#146;s
Grantor</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=839932,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Trust in a lump sum within
thirty (30) days following the date of such termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7-13.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CHANGE IN CONTROL.&#160; A &#147;Change in
Control&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred on the earliest of the following
dates:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the date any Person is or becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or
indirectly, of securities of Abbott (not including in the securities
beneficially owned by such Person any securities acquired directly from Abbott
or its Affiliates) representing 20% or more of the combined voting power of
Abbott&#146;s then outstanding securities, excluding any Person who becomes such a
Beneficial Owner in connection with a transaction described in clause (i)&nbsp;of
paragraph (c)&nbsp;below; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the date the following individuals cease for any reason to constitute a
majority of the number of directors then serving: individuals who, on the date
hereof, constitute the Board of Directors and any new director (other than a
director whose initial assumption of office is in connection with an actual or
threatened election contest, including but not limited to a consent
solicitation, relating to the election of directors of Abbott) whose
appointment or election by the Board of Directors or nomination for election by
Abbott&#146;s shareholders was approved or recommended by a vote of at least
two-thirds (2/3) of the directors then still in office who either were
directors on the date hereof or whose appointment, election or nomination for
election was previously so approved or recommended; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the date on which there is consummated a merger or consolidation of
Abbott or any direct or indirect subsidiary of Abbott with any other
corporation or other entity, other than (i)&nbsp;a merger or consolidation (A)&nbsp;immediately
following which the individuals who comprise the Board of Directors immediately
prior thereto constitute at least a majority of the Board of Directors of
Abbott, the entity surviving such merger or consolidation or, if Abbott or the
entity surviving such merger or consolidation is then a subsidiary, the
ultimate parent thereof and (B)&nbsp;which results in the voting securities of
Abbott outstanding immediately prior to such merger or consolidation continuing
to represent (either by remaining outstanding or by being converted into voting
securities of the surviving entity or any parent thereof), in combination with
the ownership of any trustee or other fiduciary holding securities under an
employee benefit plan of Abbott or any subsidiary of Abbott, at least 50% of
the combined voting power of the securities of Abbott or such surviving entity
or any parent thereof outstanding immediately after such merger or
consolidation, or (ii)&nbsp;a merger or consolidation effected to implement a
recapitalization of Abbott (or similar transaction) in which no Person is or
becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of Abbott
(not including in the securities Beneficially Owned by such Person any
securities acquired directly from Abbott or its Affiliates) representing 20% or
more of the combined voting power of Abbott&#146;s then outstanding securities; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the date the shareholders of Abbott approve a plan of complete
liquidation or dissolution of Abbott or there is consummated an agreement for
the sale or</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="3",CHK=974598,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KM-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:28 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">disposition by Abbott of all
or substantially all of Abbott&#146;s assets, other than a sale or disposition by
Abbott of all or substantially all of Abbott&#146;s assets to an entity, at least
