<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 10.3</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES
SUPPLEMENTAL PENSION PLAN</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(As amended and
restated effective January&nbsp;1, 2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=999610,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES
SUPPLEMENTAL PENSION PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1<br>
INTRODUCTION</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">On September&nbsp;9, 1977, December&nbsp;14,
1979 and February&nbsp;10, 1984 the Board of Directors of Abbott Laboratories (&#147;Abbott&#148;)
adopted certain resolutions providing for payment of (i)&nbsp;pension benefits
calculated under the Abbott Laboratories Annuity Retirement Plan (&#147;Annuity Plan&#148;)
in excess of those which may be paid under that plan under the limits imposed
by Section&nbsp;415 of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and the
Employee Retirement Income Security Act (&#147;ERISA&#148;) and (ii)&nbsp;the additional
pension benefits that would be payable under the Annuity Plan if deferred awards
under the Abbott Laboratories Management Incentive Plan were included in &#147;final
earnings&#148; as defined in the Annuity Plan.&#160;
The ABBOTT LABORATORIES SUPPLEMENTAL PENSION PLAN (this &#147;Supplemental
Plan&#148;) clarified, restated and superseded the prior resolutions and is hereby
amended and restated in accordance with the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A
of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (&#147;Code Section&nbsp;409A&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Supplemental Plan shall apply to
employees of Abbott and its subsidiaries and affiliates existing as of the date
of adoption of the Supplemental Plan or thereafter created or acquired.&#160; (Abbott and each of such subsidiaries and
affiliates are hereinafter referred to as an &#147;employer&#148; and collectively as the
&#147;employers&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1-3.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">All benefits provided under the
Supplemental Plan shall be provided from the general assets of the employers
and not from any trust fund or other designated asset.&#160; All participants in the Supplemental Plan
shall be general creditors of the employers with no priority over other
creditors.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1-4.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Supplemental Plan shall be
administered by the Abbott Laboratories Employee Benefit Board of Review
appointed and acting under the Annuity Plan (&#147;Board of Review&#148;).&#160; Except as stated below, the Board of Review
shall perform all powers and duties with respect to the Supplemental Plan,
including the power to direct payment of benefits, allocate costs among
employers, adopt amendments and determine questions of interpretation.&#160; The Board of Directors of Abbott (the &#147;Board
of Directors&#148;) shall have the sole authority to terminate the Supplemental
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1-5.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding anything in the
Supplemental Plan to the contrary, any amounts under the Supplemental Plan that
were earned and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (as determined in accordance
with Code Section&nbsp;409A) with respect to participants who retired before January&nbsp;1,
2005 (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;) shall be subject to the terms and conditions of
the Supplemental Plan as administered and as in effect on December&nbsp;31,
2004.&#160; Amendments made to the
Supplemental Plan pursuant to this amendment and restatement or otherwise shall
not affect the Grandfathered Amounts unless expressly provided for in the
amendment.&#160; The terms and conditions
applicable to the Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in Appendix A attached
hereto.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=766708,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2<br>
ERISA ANNUITY PLAN SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;2
shall apply to all participants in the Annuity Plan who retire, or terminate
with a vested pension under that plan, on or after September&nbsp;9, 1977.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Annuity Plan participant whose
retirement or vested pension under that plan would otherwise be limited by Section&nbsp;415,
Internal Revenue Code, shall receive a supplemental pension under this
Supplemental Plan in an amount, which, when added to his or her Annuity Plan
pension (calculated as if such pension had been payable based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4), will equal the amount
the participant would be entitled to under the Annuity Plan as in effect from
time to time, calculated as if such pension had been payable based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, without regard to the
limitations imposed by Section&nbsp;415, Internal Revenue Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3<br>
1986 TAX REFORM&nbsp;ACT SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;3
shall apply to all participants in the Annuity Plan who retire, or terminate
with a vested pension under that plan, after December&nbsp;31, 1988.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Annuity Plan participant shall
receive a supplemental pension under this Supplemental Plan in an amount
determined as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 94.3pt;text-indent:-40.3pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The supplemental pension shall be
the difference, if any, between:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan based on the distribution rules&nbsp;established
hereunder and the pension form selected by the participant as permitted by
subsections 8-3 and 8-4 plus any supplement provided by Section&nbsp;2; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan, calculated based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, (without regard to the
limits imposed by Section&nbsp;415, Internal Revenue Code) if the participant&#146;s
&#147;final earnings&#148;, as defined in the Annuity Plan, had included compensation in
excess of the limits imposed by Section&nbsp;401(a)(17), Internal Revenue Code,
and any &#147;pre-tax contributions&#148; made by the participant under the Abbott
Laboratories Supplemental 401(k)&nbsp;Plan.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=875980,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFERRED
COMPENSATION PLAN ANNUITY PLAN SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;4
shall apply to all participants in the Annuity Plan who retire, or terminate
with a vested pension, under that plan, on or after January&nbsp;1, 2002 and who
made a Deferral Election under the Abbott Laboratories Deferred Compensation
Plan (the &#147;Deferred Compensation Plan&#148;) with respect to any calendar month
during the one hundred twenty consecutive calendar months immediately preceding
retirement or termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Annuity Plan participant shall
receive a supplemental pension under this Supplemental Plan in an amount
determined as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 94.3pt;text-indent:-40.3pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The supplemental pension shall be
the difference, if any, between:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan based on the distribution rules&nbsp;established
hereunder and the pension form selected by the participant as permitted by
subsections 8-3 and 8-4 plus any supplement provided by Section&nbsp;2 and Section&nbsp;3;
and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan, calculated based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, (without regard to the
limits imposed by Section&nbsp;415, Internal Revenue Code) if the participant&#146;s
&#147;base earnings&#148;, as defined in the Annuity Plan, included deferrals made under
the Deferred Compensation Plan and any compensation in excess of the limits imposed
by Section&nbsp;401(a)(17), Internal Revenue Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5<br>
DEFERRED MIP ANNUITY PLAN SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;5
shall apply to all participants in the Annuity Plan who retire, or terminate
with a vested pension, under that plan, on or after December&nbsp;14, 1979 and
who were awarded Management Incentive Plan awards for any calendar year during
the ten consecutive calendar years ending with the year of retirement or
termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Annuity Plan participant shall
receive a supplemental pension under this Supplemental Plan in an amount
determined as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 94.3pt;text-indent:-40.3pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The supplemental pension shall be
the difference, if any, between:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan based on the distribution rules&nbsp;established
hereunder and the pension form selected by the</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">participant as
permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4 plus any supplement provided by Section&nbsp;2,
Section&nbsp;3, and Section&nbsp;4; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical monthly benefit
that would have been payable under the Annuity Plan, calculated based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, (without regard to the
limits imposed by Section&nbsp;415, Internal Revenue Code) if the participant&#146;s
&#147;final earnings&#148;, as defined in the Annuity Plan, were one-sixtieth of the sum
of:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;text-indent:-.35in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">A.&#160; the
participant&#146;s total &#147;basic earnings&#148; (excluding any payments under the
Management Incentive Plan or any Division Incentive Plan) received in the sixty
consecutive calendar months for which his basic earnings (excluding any
payments under the Management Incentive Plan or any Division Incentive Plan) were
highest within the last one hundred twenty consecutive calendar months
immediately preceding his retirement or termination of employment; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">B.&#160; the
amount of the participant&#146;s total awards under the Management Incentive Plan
and any Division Incentive Plan (whether paid immediately or deferred) made for
the five consecutive calendar years during the ten consecutive calendar years
ending with the year of retirement or termination for which such amount is the
greatest and (for participants granted Management Incentive Plan awards for
less than five consecutive calendar years during such ten year period) which
include all Management Incentive Plan awards granted for consecutive calendar
years within such ten year period.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">That portion of any Management
Incentive Plan award which the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors
of Abbott (&#147;Committee&#148;) has determined shall be excluded from the participant&#146;s
&#147;basic earnings&#148; shall be excluded from the calculation of &#147;final earnings&#148; for
purposes of this subsection 5-2.&#160; &#147;Final
earnings&#148; for purposes of this subsection 5-2 shall include any compensation in
excess of the limits imposed by Section&nbsp;401(a)(17), Internal Revenue Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In the event the period described in
subsection 5-2(a)(ii)(B)&nbsp;is the final five calendar years of employment
and a Management Incentive Plan award is made to the participant subsequent to
retirement for the participant&#146;s final calendar year of employment, the
supplemental pension shall be adjusted by adding such new award and subtracting
a portion of the earliest Management Incentive Plan award included in the
calculation, from the amount determined under subsection 5-2(a)(ii)(B).&#160; The portion subtracted shall be equal to that</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=681342,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">portion of the
participant&#146;s final calendar year of employment during which the participant
was employed by Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6<br>
CORPORATE OFFICER ANNUITY PLAN SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;6
shall apply to all participants in the Annuity Plan who are corporate officers
of Abbott as of September&nbsp;30, 1993 or who become corporate officers
thereafter, and who retire, or terminate with a vested pension under that plan
on or after September&nbsp;30, 1993.&#160; The
term &#147;corporate officer&#148; for purposes of this Supplemental Plan shall mean an
individual elected an officer of Abbott by its Board of Directors (or
designated as such for purposes of this Section&nbsp;6 by the Compensation
Committee), but shall not include assistant officers.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subject to the limitations and
adjustments described below, each participant described in subsection 6-1 shall
receive a monthly supplemental pension under this Supplemental Plan commencing
on the date determined in accordance with subsection 8-2 and payable as a life
annuity, equal to 6/10 of 1 percent (.006) of the participant&#146;s final earnings
(as determined under subsection 5-2) for each of the first twenty years of the
participant&#146;s benefit service (as defined in the Annuity Plan) occurring after
the participant&#146;s attainment of age 35.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-3.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In no event shall the sum of (a)&nbsp;the
participant&#146;s aggregate percentage of final earnings calculated under
subsection 6-2 and (b)&nbsp;of the participant&#146;s aggregate percentage of final
earnings calculated under subsection 5-1 of the Annuity Plan, excluding
5-1(a)(ii)(B), exceed the maximum aggregate percentage of final earnings
allowed under subsection 5-1 (also
excluding 5-1(a)(ii)(B)) of the Annuity Plan (without regard to any
limits imposed by the Internal Revenue Code), as in effect on the date of the
participant&#146;s retirement or termination.&#160;
In the event the limitation described in this subsection&nbsp;6-3 would
be exceeded for any participant, the participant&#146;s aggregate percentage
calculated under subsection 6-2 shall be reduced until the limit is not
exceeded.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-4.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Benefit service occurring between
the date a participant ceases to be a corporate officer of Abbott and the date
the participant again becomes a corporate officer of Abbott shall be
disregarded in calculating the participant&#146;s aggregate percentage under
subsection 6-2.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-5.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any supplemental pension otherwise
due a participant under this Section&nbsp;6 shall be reduced by the amount (if
any) by which:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical benefits that would
be payable to such participant under the Annuity Plan, based on the
distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form selected by
the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, and this Supplemental
Plan exceeds</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the hypothetical maximum benefit
that would be payable to the participant under the Annuity Plan, calculated
based on the distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder and the pension form
selected by the participant as permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4, (without
regard to the limits imposed by Section&nbsp;415, Internal Revenue Code) based
on the participant&#146;s final earnings (as</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=580010,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">determined
under subsection 5-2), if the participant had accrued the maximum benefit
service recognized by the Annuity Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6-6.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any supplemental pension due a
participant under this Section&nbsp;6 shall be actuarially adjusted as provided
in the Annuity Plan to reflect the pension form selected by the participant as
permitted by subsections 8-3 and 8-4 and the participant&#146;s age at commencement
of the pension as provided in Section&nbsp;7.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7<br>
CORPORATE OFFICER ANNUITY PLAN<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EARLY RETIREMENT BENEFIT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The benefits described in this Section&nbsp;7
shall apply to all persons described in subsection 6-1.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The supplemental pension due under
Sections 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 to each participant described in subsection 7-1 shall
be reduced in accordance with the rules&nbsp;provided in subsections 5-3 and
5-6 of the Annuity Plan for each month by which its commencement date precedes
the last day of the month in which the participant will attain age 60.&#160; No reduction will be made for the period
between the last day of the months the participant will attain age 60 and age
62.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7-3.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each participant described in
subsection 7-1 shall receive a monthly supplemental pension under this
Supplemental Plan equal to any hypothetical reduction made in such participant&#146;s
Annuity Plan pension in accordance with the rules&nbsp;provided in subsections
5-3 or 5-6 of the Annuity Plan for the period between the last day of the
months the participant will attain age 60 and age 62, calculated as if the
participant had commenced receipt of the participant&#146;s Annuity Plan pension on
the same date on which the participant commences receipt of the participant&#146;s
supplemental pension based on the distribution rules&nbsp;established hereunder
and the pension form selected by the participant as permitted by subsections
8-3 and 8-4.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8<br>
MISCELLANEOUS</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For purposes of this Supplemental
Plan, the term &#147;Management Incentive Plan&#148; shall mean the Abbott Laboratories
1971 Management Incentive Plan, the Abbott Laboratories 1981 Management
Incentive Plan and all successor plans to those plans.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The monthly vested supplemental
pension described in Sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 shall commence to be paid to
the participant or his or her beneficiary on the last day of the month
following the month in which:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For the participant hired before
2004, the later of the date on which such participant attains age 50 and the
date such participant&#146;s employment is terminated; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">For the participant hired after
2003, the later of the date on which such participant attains age 55 and the
date such participant&#146;s employment is terminated.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=264568,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of subsection 8-2, any
participant eligible to make an election under Section&nbsp;9 may make such
election with respect to any accruals for services performed in the year
following the year such election is made.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of subsection 8-2, in the
event that the present value of participant&#146;s supplemental pension under
Sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 does not exceed in the aggregate $25,000 as of the
commencement date of the pension payable to such participant or his or her
beneficiary, and payment of such supplemental pension has not been previously
made under Section&nbsp;9, the present value of such supplemental pension shall
be paid to such participant in a lump-sum on such commencement date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-3.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Except as otherwise specifically
provided, payment of the monthly vested supplemental pension described in
Sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7 shall be made to a participant as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Life Annuity</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A participant who is not legally married on the date as of which such
payments commence shall receive a monthly retirement income or monthly deferred
vested benefit in accordance with the plan payable on a life annuity basis,
with the last payment to be made for the month in which his or her death
occurs.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">50% Joint and Survivor Annuity</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A participant who is legally married on the date as of which such
payments commence shall receive a 50% joint and survivor annuity which is
actuarially equivalent to the amount of monthly retirement income or monthly
deferred vested benefit otherwise payable to him or her in accordance with the
plan on a life annuity basis. Such joint and survivor annuity shall consist of
a reduced monthly retirement income or monthly deferred vested benefit
continuing during the participant&#146;s lifetime, and if the participant&#146;s spouse
is living at the date of the participant&#146;s death, payment of one-half of such
reduced monthly retirement income or monthly deferred vested benefit to such
spouse until the spouse&#146;s death occurs, with the last payment to be made for
the month of the death of the last to die of the participant and his or her
spouse. The joint and survivor annuity payable hereunder to or with respect to
a participant who retires on a late retirement date shall be computed as if
such participant had retired on his or her normal retirement date using for the
age of his or her spouse as of his or her late retirement date, that spouse&#146;s
age as of his or her normal retirement date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-4.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In lieu of the form and amount of supplemental
pension benefit specified in subsection 8-3, a participant may elect, prior to
commencement, a supplemental pension benefit, which is actuarially equivalent
to the form of payment specified in subsection 8-3(a), in the annuity forms
permitted by the Board of Review, provided that the scheduled date for the
first annuity payment is not changed as a result of such election.&#160; For purposes of this provision, the term &#147;actuarially
equivalent&#148; shall have the meaning provided by Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-2(b)(2)(ii)(A),
applying reasonable actuarial methods and assumptions, which must be the same
for each annuity payment option and otherwise comply with the rules&nbsp;provided
by Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-2(b)(2)(ii)(D).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">

<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left">

</font></b></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=445849,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:22 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">An election under this subsection 8-4 must be
in writing, signed by the participant, and filed with the Board of Review at
such time and in such manner as the Board of Review shall determine; and will
be effective only if the participant&#146;s spouse, if any, consents to the election
in writing, and such consent acknowledges the effect of the election and is
witnessed by a plan representative or a notary public. In any case where a
participant elects an optional form of benefit, the option shall be designed so
that more than 50 percent of the actuarial reserve required to provide the
participant&#146;s monthly vested supplemental pension benefit in the normal form
will be applied to provide the participant&#146;s benefits under the option during
the period of the participant&#146;s life expectancy. Payment of an optional form of
benefit will commence no later than the date on which the participant&#146;s monthly
supplemental pension benefit would otherwise commence. An election under this
subs 8-4 may not be changed after payment of the participant&#146;s supplemental
pension benefit has commenced.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding
any other provision of this Supplemental Plan, if a participant terminates
employment within two (2)&nbsp;years following the occurrence of a Change in
Control, the present value of his or her supplemental pension under Sections 2,
3, 4 and 5, but excluding any amounts with respect to which an election under Section&nbsp;9
has been made, whether or not then payable or vested) shall be paid to such
participant in a lump sum, calculated using reasonable actuarial assumptions
and methods, within thirty (30) days following the date of such termination of
employment; provided that the event constituting a Change in Control is also a &#147;change
in control event&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167;
1.409A-3(i)(5).&#160; The supplemental pension
under Section&nbsp;2 shall be computed using as the applicable limit under Section&nbsp;415
of the Internal Revenue Code, such limit as is in&#160; effect on the termination date and based on
the assumption that the participant will receive his or her supplemental
pension in the form of a straight life annuity with no ancillary benefits.&#160; The present values of the supplemental
pensions under Sections 2, 3, 4 and 5 shall be computed as of the date of
payment using an interest rate equal to the Pension Benefit Guaranty
Corporation interest rate applicable to an immediate annuity, as in effect on
the date of payment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; For
purposes of subsection 8-5, a &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall be deemed to have
occurred on the earliest of the following dates:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the date any Person is or becomes
the Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of Abbott (not
including in the securities beneficially owned by such Person any securities
acquired directly from Abbott or its Affiliates) representing 20% or more of
the combined voting power of Abbott&#146;s then outstanding securities, excluding
any Person who becomes such a Beneficial Owner in connection with a transaction
described in clause (i)&nbsp;of paragraph (c)&nbsp;below; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the date the following individuals
cease for any reason to constitute a majority of the number of directors then
serving: individuals who, on the date hereof, constitute the Board of Directors
and any new director (other than a director whose initial assumption of office
is in connection with an actual or threatened election contest, including but
not limited to a consent solicitation, relating to the election of directors of
Abbott) whose appointment or election by the Board of Directors or nomination for
election by Abbott&#146;s shareholders</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=723153,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:24 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">was approved or
recommended by a vote of at least two-thirds (2/3) of the directors then still
in office who either were directors on the date hereof or whose appointment,
election or nomination for election was previously so approved or recommended;
or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the date on which there is
consummated a merger or consolidation of Abbott or any direct or indirect
subsidiary of Abbott with any other corporation or other entity, other than (i)&nbsp;a
merger or consolidation (A)&nbsp;immediately following which the individuals
who comprise the Board of Directors immediately prior thereto constitute at
least a majority of the Board of Directors of Abbott, the entity surviving such
merger or consolidation or, if Abbott or the entity surviving such merger or
consolidation is then a subsidiary, the ultimate parent thereof and (B)&nbsp;which
results in the voting securities of Abbott outstanding immediately prior to
such merger or consolidation continuing to represent (either by remaining
outstanding or by being converted into voting securities of the surviving
entity or any parent thereof), in combination with the ownership of any trustee
or other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of Abbott
or any subsidiary of Abbott, at least 50% of the combined voting power of the
securities of Abbott or such surviving entity or any parent thereof outstanding
immediately after such merger or consolidation, or (ii)&nbsp;a merger or
consolidation effected to implement a recapitalization of Abbott (or similar
transaction) in which no Person is or becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or
indirectly, of securities of Abbott (not including in the securities
Beneficially Owned by such Person any securities acquired directly from Abbott
or its Affiliates) representing 20% or more of the combined voting power of
Abbott&#146;s then outstanding securities; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the date the shareholders of Abbott
approve a plan of complete liquidation or dissolution of Abbott or there is
consummated an agreement for the sale or disposition by Abbott of all or
substantially all of Abbott&#146;s assets, other than a sale or disposition by
Abbott of all or substantially all of Abbott&#146;s assets to an entity, at least
50% of the combined voting power of the voting securities of which are owned by
shareholders of Abbott, in combination with the ownership of any trustee or
other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of Abbott or
any subsidiary of Abbott, in substantially the same proportions as their
ownership of Abbott immediately prior to such sale.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing, a &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall not be
deemed to have occurred by virtue of the consummation of any transaction or
series of integrated transactions immediately following which the record
holders of the common stock of Abbott immediately prior to such transaction or
series of transactions continue to have substantially the same proportionate
ownership in an entity which owns all or substantially all of the assets of
Abbott immediately following such transaction or series of transactions.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=980840,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-03_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 12:24 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of this Supplemental Plan: &#147;Affiliate&#148; shall have the
meaning set forth in Rule&nbsp;12b-2 promulgated under Section&nbsp;12 of the
Exchange Act; &#147;Beneficial Owner&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Rule&nbsp;13d-3
under the Exchange Act; &#147;Exchange Act&#148; shall mean the Securities Exchange Act
of 1934, as amended from time to time; and &#147;Person&#148; shall have the meaning
given in Section&nbsp;3(a)(9)&nbsp;of the Exchange Act, as modified and used in
Sections 13(d)&nbsp;and 14(d)&nbsp;thereof, except that such term shall not
include (i)&nbsp;Abbott or any of its subsidiaries, (ii)&nbsp;a trustee or
other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of Abbott or
any of its Affiliates, (iii)&nbsp;an underwriter temporarily holding securities
pursuant to an offering of such securities, or (iv)&nbsp;a corporation owned,
directly or indirectly, by the shareholders of Abbott in substantially the same
proportions as their ownership of stock of Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; POTENTIAL
CHANGE IN CONTROL.&#160; A &#147;Potential Change
in Control&#148; shall exist during any period in which the circumstances described
in paragraphs (a), (b), (c)&nbsp;or (d), below, exist (provided, however, that
a Potential Change in Control shall cease to exist not later than the
occurrence of a Change in Control):</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Abbott enters into an agreement, the
consummation of which would result in the occurrence of a Change in Control,
provided that a Potential Change in Control described in this paragraph (a)&nbsp;shall
cease to exist upon the expiration or other termination of all such agreements.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any Person (without regard to the
exclusions set forth in subsections (i)&nbsp;through (iv)&nbsp;of such
definition) publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking
actions the consummation of which would constitute a Change in Control;
provided that a Potential Change in Control described in this paragraph (b)&nbsp;shall
cease to exist upon the withdrawal of such intention, or upon a determination
by the Board of Directors that there is no reasonable chance that such actions
would be consummated.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any Person becomes the Beneficial
Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of Abbott representing 10% or more
of either the then outstanding shares of common stock of Abbott or the combined
voting power of Abbott&#146;s then outstanding securities (not including any
securities beneficially owned by such Person which are or were acquired
directly from Abbott or its Affiliates).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Board of Directors adopts a
resolution to the effect that, for purposes of this Agreement, a Potential
Change in Control exists; provided that a Potential Change in Control described
in this paragraph (d)&nbsp;shall cease to exist upon a determination by the
Board of Directors that the reasons that gave rise to the resolution providing
for the existence of a Potential Change in Control have expired or no longer
exist.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8-8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
provisions of subsections 8-5, 8-6, 8-7 and this subsection 8-8 may not be
amended or deleted, nor superseded by any other provision of this Supplemental
Plan, (i)&nbsp;during</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
