<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=19,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=216320,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">APPENDIX B</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SUPPLEMENTAL
BENEFIT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">GRANTOR
TRUST</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS
AGREEMENT, made this&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;day
of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
20 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, by and between&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
(the &#147;grantor&#148;), and The Northern Trust Company, located at Chicago, Illinois,
as trustee (the &#147;trustee&#148;),</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH THAT:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the
grantor desires to establish and maintain a trust to hold certain benefits
received by the grantor under the Abbott Laboratories Supplemental Pension
Plan, as it may be amended from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW,
THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE I<br>
Introduction</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">I-1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Name</u>.&#160; This agreement and the trust hereby evidenced
(the &#147;trust&#148;) may be referred to as the &#147;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Supplemental Benefit Grantor Trust.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">I-2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>The Trust Fund</u>.&#160; The &#147;trust fund&#148; as at any date means all
property then held by the trustee under this agreement.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">I-3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Status of the Trust</u>.&#160; The trust shall be irrevocable.&#160; The trust is intended to constitute a grantor
trust under Sections 671-678 of the Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and
shall be construed accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">I-4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>The Administrator</u>.&#160; Abbott Laboratories (&#147;Abbott&#148;) shall act as
the &#147;administrator&#148; of the trust, and as such shall have certain powers, rights
and duties under this agreement as described below.&#160; Abbott will certify to the trustee from time
to time the person or persons authorized to act on behalf of Abbott as the
administrator.&#160; The trustee may rely on
the latest certificate received without further inquiry or verification.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">I-5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Acceptance</u>.&#160; The trustee accepts the duties and
obligations of the &#147;trustee&#148; hereunder, agrees to accept funds delivered to it
by the grantor or the administrator, and agrees to hold such funds (and any
proceeds from the investment of such funds) in trust in accordance with this
agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=20,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=877519,FOLIO='18',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE II<br>
Distribution of the Trust Fund</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">II-1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Supplemental Pension Account</u>.&#160; The administrator shall maintain a &#147;supplemental
pension account&#148; under the trust.&#160; As of
the end of each calendar year, the administrator shall charge the account with
all distributions made from the account during that year; and credit the
account with its share of trust income and realized gains and charge the
account with its share of trust expenses and realized losses for the year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">II-2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Distributions Prior to the Grantor&#146;s
Death</u>.&#160; Principal and accumulated
income shall not be distributed from the trust prior to the grantor&#146;s
retirement or other termination of employment with Abbott or a subsidiary of
Abbott (the grantor&#146;s &#147;settlement date&#148;); provided that, each year the
administrator may direct the trustee to distribute to the grantor a portion of
the income of the trust fund for that year, with the balance of such income to
be accumulated in the trust.&#160; The
administrator shall inform the trustee of the grantor&#146;s settlement date.&#160; Thereafter, the trustee shall distribute the
amounts from time to time credited to the supplemental pension account to the
grantor, if then living, in the same manner, at the same time and over the same
period as the pension payable to the grantor under Abbott Laboratories Annuity
Retirement Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">II-3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Distributions After the Grantor&#146;s
Death</u>.&#160; The grantor, from time to
time may name any person or persons (who may be named contingently or
successively and who may be natural persons or fiduciaries) to whom the
principal of the trust fund and all accrued or undistributed income thereof
shall be distributed upon the grantor&#146;s death.&#160;
The grantor may direct that such amounts be distributed in a lump sum
or, if the beneficiary is the grantor&#146;s spouse (or a trust [a &#147;Trust&#148;] for
which the grantor&#146;s spouse is the sole income beneficiary), in the same manner,
at the same time and over the same period as the pension payable to the grantor&#146;s
surviving spouse under the Abbott Laboratories Annuity Retirement Plan.&#160; If the grantor directs the same method of
distribution as the pension payable to the surviving spouse under the Abbott
Laboratories Annuity Retirement Plan to the spouse as beneficiary, any amounts
remaining at the death of the spouse beneficiary shall be distributed in a lump
sum to the executor or administrator of the spouse beneficiary&#146;s estate.&#160; If the grantor directs the same method of
distribution as the pension payable to the surviving spouse under the Abbott
Laboratories Annuity Retirement Plan to a Trust for which the grantor&#146;s spouse
is the sole income beneficiary, any amounts remaining at the death of the
spouse shall be distributed in a lump sum to such Trust.&#160; Despite the foregoing, if (i)&nbsp;the
beneficiary is a Trust for which the grantor&#146;s spouse is the sole income beneficiary,
(ii)&nbsp;payments are being made pursuant to this paragraph II-3 other than in
a lump sum and (iii)&nbsp;income earned by the trust fund for the year exceeds
the amount of the annual installment payment, then such Trust may elect to
withdraw such excess income by written notice to the trustee.&#160; Each designation shall revoke all prior
designations, shall be in writing and shall be effective only when filed by the
grantor with the administrator during the grantor&#146;s lifetime.&#160; If the grantor fails to direct a method of
distribution, the distribution shall be made in a lump sum.&#160; If the grantor fails to designate a
beneficiary as provided above, then on the grantor&#146;s death, the trustee shall
distribute the balance of the trust fund in a lump sum to the executor or
administrator of the grantor&#146;s estate.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">II-4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Facility of Payment</u>.&#160; When a person entitled to a distribution
hereunder is under legal disability, or, in the trustee&#146;s opinion, is in any
way incapacitated so as to be unable to manage his or her financial affairs,
the trustee may make such distribution to such person&#146;s legal representative,
or to a relative or friend of such person for such person&#146;s benefit.&#160; Any</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=21,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=1013081,FOLIO='19',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">distribution made in
accordance with the preceding sentence shall be a full and complete discharge
of any liability for such distribution hereunder.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">II-5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Perpetuities</u>.&#160; Notwithstanding any other provisions of this
agreement, on the day next preceding the end of 21 years after the death of the
last to die of the grantor and the grantor&#146;s descendants living on the date of
this instrument, the trustee shall immediately distribute any remaining balance
in the trust to the beneficiaries then entitled to distributions hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE III<br>
Management of the Trust Fund</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">III-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">General Powers</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; The trustee
shall, with respect to the trust fund, have the following powers, rights and
duties in addition to those provided elsewhere in this agreement or by law:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subject to the limitations of
subparagraph (b)&nbsp;next below, to sell, contract to sell, purchase, grant or
exercise options to purchase, and otherwise deal with all assets of the trust
fund, in such way, for such considerations, and on such terms and conditions as
the trustee decides.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To invest and reinvest the trust
fund, without distinction between principal and income, in obligations of the
United States Government and its agencies or which are backed by the full faith
and credit of the United States Government and in any mutual funds, common
trust funds or collective investment funds which invest solely in such
obligations, provided that to the extent practicable no more than Ten Thousand
Dollars ($10,000) shall be invested in such mutual funds, common trust funds or
collective investment funds at any time; and any such investment made or
retained by the trustee in good faith shall be proper despite any resulting
risk or lack of diversification or marketability.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To deposit cash in any depositary
(including the banking department of the bank acting as trustee) without
liability for interest, in amounts not in excess of those reasonably necessary
to make distributions from the trust.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To borrow from anyone, with the
administrator&#146;s approval, such sum or sums from time to time as the trustee
considers desirable to carry out this trust, and to mortgage or pledge all or
part of the trust fund as security.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To retain any funds or property
subject to any dispute without liability for interest and to decline to make
payment or delivery thereof until final adjudication by a court of competent
jurisdiction or until an appropriate release is obtained.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To begin, maintain or defend any
litigation necessary in connection with the administration of this trust,
except that the trustee shall not be obliged or required to do so unless
indemnified to the trustee&#146;s satisfaction.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To compromise, contest, settle or
abandon claims or demands.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=22,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=812345,FOLIO='20',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To give proxies to vote stocks and
other voting securities, to join in or oppose (alone or jointly with others)
voting trusts, mergers, consolidations, foreclosures, reorganizations,
liquidations, or other changes in the financial structure of any corporation,
and to exercise or sell stock subscription or conversion rights.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To hold securities or other property
in the name of a nominee, in a depositary, or in any other way, with or without
disclosing the trust relationship.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To divide or distribute the trust
fund in undivided interests or wholly or partly in kind.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(k)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To pay any tax imposed on or with
respect to the trust; to defer making payment of any such tax if it is
indemnified to its satisfaction in the premises; and to require before making
any payment such release or other document from any lawful taxing authority and
such indemnity from the intended payee as the trustee considers necessary for
its protection.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(l)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To deal without restriction with the
legal representative of the grantor&#146;s estate or the trustee or other legal
representative of any trust created by the grantor or a trust or estate in
which a beneficiary has an interest, even though the trustee, individually,
shall be acting in such other capacity, without liability for any loss that may
result.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(m)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Upon the prior written consent of
the administrator, to appoint or remove by written instrument any bank or
corporation qualified to act as successor trustee, wherever located, as special
trustee as to part or all of the trust fund, including property as to which the
trustee does not act, and such special trustee, except as specifically limited
or provided by this or the appointing instrument, shall have all of the rights,
titles, powers, duties, discretions and immunities of the trustee, without
liability for any action taken or omitted to be taken under this or the
appointing instrument.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(n)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To appoint or remove by written
instrument any bank, wherever located, as custodian of part or all of the trust
fund, and each such custodian shall have such rights, powers, duties and
discretions as are delegated to it by the trustee.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(o)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To employ agents, attorneys,
accountants or other persons, and to delegate to them such powers as the
trustee considers desirable, and the trustee shall be protected in acting or
refraining from acting on the advice of persons so employed without court
action.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(p)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To perform any and all other acts
which in the trustee&#146;s judgment are appropriate for the proper management,
investment and distribution of the trust fund.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">III-2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Principal and Income</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Any income earned on the trust fund which is not distributed as provided
in Article&nbsp;II shall be accumulated and from time to time added to the
principal of the </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=23,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=604629,FOLIO='21',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">trust.&#160; The grantor&#146;s interest in the trust shall include
all assets or other property held by the trustee hereunder, including principal
and accumulated income.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">III-3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Statements</u>.&#160; The trustee shall prepare and deliver monthly
to the administrator and annually to the grantor, if then living, otherwise to
each beneficiary then entitled to distributions under this agreement, a
statement (or series of statements) setting forth (or which taken together set
forth) all investments, receipts, disbursements and other transactions effected
by the trustee during the reporting period; and showing the trust fund and the
value thereof at the end of such period.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">III-4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Compensation and Expenses</u>.&#160; All reasonable costs, charges and expenses
incurred in the administration of this trust, including compensation to the
trustee, any compensation to agents, attorneys, accountants and other persons
employed by the trustee, and expenses incurred in connection with the sale,
investment and reinvestment of the trust fund shall be paid from the trust
fund.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE IV<br>
General Provisions</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Interests Not Transferable</u>.&#160; The interests of the grantor or other persons
entitled to distributions hereunder are not subject to their debts or other
obligations and may not be voluntarily or involuntarily sold, transferred,
alienated, assigned or encumbered.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Disagreements as to Acts</u>.&#160; If there is a disagreement between the
trustee and anyone as to any act or transaction reported in any accounting, the
trustee shall have the right to a settlement of its account by any court.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Trustee&#146;s Obligations</u>.&#160; No power, duty or responsibility is imposed
on the trustee except as set forth in this agreement.&#160; The trustee is not obliged to determine
whether funds delivered to or distributions from the trust are proper under the
trust, or whether any tax is due or payable as a result of any such delivery or
distribution.&#160; The trustee shall be
protected in making any distribution from the trust as directed pursuant to Article&nbsp;II
without inquiring as to whether the distributee is entitled thereto; the trustee
shall not be liable for any distribution made in good faith without written
notice or knowledge that the distribution is not proper under the terms of this
agreement; and the trustee shall not be liable for any action taken because of
the specific direction of the administrator.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Good Faith Actions</u>.&#160; The trustee&#146;s exercise or non-exercise of its
powers and discretions in good faith shall be conclusive on all persons.&#160; No one shall be obliged to see to the
application of any money paid or property delivered to the trustee.&#160; The certificate of the trustee that it is
acting according to this agreement will fully protect all persons dealing with
the trustee.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Waiver of Notice</u>.&#160; Any notice required under this agreement may
be waived by the person entitled to such notice.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Controlling Law</u>.&#160; The laws of the State of Illinois shall
govern the interpretation and validity of the provisions of this agreement and
all questions relating to the management, administration, investment and
distribution of the trust hereby created.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=24,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="4",CHK=133310,FOLIO='22',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KO-05_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:01 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">IV-7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Successors</u>.&#160; This agreement shall be binding on all
persons entitled to distributions hereunder and their respective heirs and
legal representatives, and on the trustee and its successors.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE V<br>
Changes in Trustee</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">V-1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Resignation or Removal of Trustee</u>.&#160; The trustee may resign at any time by giving
thirty days&#146; advance notice to the administrator and the grantor.&#160; The administrator may remove a trustee by
written notice to the trustee and the grantor.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">V-2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Appointment of Successor Trustee</u>.&#160; The administrator shall fill any vacancy in
the office of trustee as soon as practicable by written notice to the successor
trustee; and shall give prompt written notice thereof to the grantor, if then
living, otherwise to each beneficiary then entitled to payments or
distributions under this agreement.&#160; A
successor trustee shall be a bank (as defined in Section&nbsp;581 of the
Internal Revenue Code, as amended).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">V-3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Duties of Resigning or Removed
Trustee and of Successor Trustee</u>.&#160; A
trustee that resigns or is removed shall furnish promptly to the administrator
and the successor trustee an account of its administration of the trust from
the date of its last account.&#160; Each
successor trustee shall succeed to the title to the trust fund vested in its
predecessor without the signing or filing of any instrument, but each
predecessor trustee shall execute all documents and do all acts necessary to
vest such title of record in the successor trustee.&#160; Each successor trustee shall have all the
powers conferred by this agreement as if originally named trustee.&#160; No successor trustee shall be personally
liable for any act or failure to act of a predecessor trustee.&#160; With the approval of the administrator, a
successor trustee may accept the account furnished and the property delivered
by a predecessor trustee without incurring any liability for so doing, and such
acceptance will be complete discharge to the predecessor trustee.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VI<br>
Amendment and Termination</font></u></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">VI-1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Amendment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; With the
consent of the administrator, this trust may be amended from time to time by
the grantor, if then living, otherwise by a majority of the beneficiaries then
entitled to payments or distributions hereunder, except as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The duties and liabilities of the
trustee cannot be changed substantially without its consent.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">This trust may not be amended so as
to make the trust revocable.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">VI-2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Termination</u>.&#160; This trust shall not terminate, and all
rights, titles, powers, duties, discretions and immunities imposed on or
reserved to the trustee, the administrator, the grantor and the beneficiaries
shall continue in effect, until all assets of the trust have been distributed
by the trustee as provided in Article&nbsp;II.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; *&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; *</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, the grantor and the trustee have executed this agreement as of the day
and year first above written.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Grantor</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Northern
  Trust Company, as Trustee</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.9%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:47.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.9%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Its</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:47.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>

<FILENAME>a2188623zex-10_4.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.4
