<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.4</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<h1 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1986<br>
ABBOTT LABORATORIES<br>
MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN<br>
(as amended and restated effective January&nbsp;1, 2008)</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;1</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">BACKGROUND AND PURPOSES. This 1986 ABBOTT LABORATORIES
MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN (the &#147;Plan&#148;) is a successor Plan to the 1961, 1971
and 1981 Management Incentive Plans (the &#147;Predecessor Plans&#148;). This Plan is
being established by ABBOTT LABORATORIES (&#147;Abbott&#148;) for the following purposes:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To provide greater incentive for
participants in the Plan to attain and maintain the highest standards of
managerial performance by rewarding them for services rendered with
compensation, in addition to their base salaries, in proportion to the success
of Abbott and to the participants&#146; respective contribution to such success; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">To attract and retain in the employ
of Abbott and its subsidiaries persons of outstanding competence.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">EFFECTIVE DATE AND FISCAL YEAR. The Plan became
effective as of January&nbsp;1, 1986 and is hereby amended and restated as of January&nbsp;1,
2008, in accordance with the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal
Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (&#147;Code Section&nbsp;409A&#148;).&#160; The term &#147;fiscal year,&#148; as used in this Plan,
means the fiscal period from time to time employed by Abbott for the purpose of
reporting earnings to shareholders.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ADMINISTRATION. The Plan will be administered by the
Compensation Committee (the &#147;Committee&#148;) appointed by the Board of Directors of
Abbott (the &#147;Board of Directors&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">GRANDFATHERED AMOUNTS.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything in the Plan to the contrary, any amounts under
the Plan that were earned and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (as determined
in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;409A) with respect to participants who
retired before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;) shall be subject
to the terms and conditions of the Plan as administered and as in effect on December&nbsp;31,
2004.&#160; Amendments made to the Plan
pursuant to this amendment and restatement or otherwise shall not affect the
Grandfathered Amounts unless expressly provided for in the amendment.&#160; The terms and conditions applicable to the
Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;A attached hereto.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=199635,FOLIO='1',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;2</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ELIGIBILITY AND PARTICIPATION</font></b></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR PARTICIPATION. Participation in
the Plan will be limited to those Officers and managerial employees of Abbott
and its subsidiaries who, from time to time, shall be selected as participants
by the Committee.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">PARTICIPANTS. The term &#147;participant,&#148; as used in the
Plan, shall include both active participants and inactive participants.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ACTIVE PARTICIPANTS. For each fiscal year, there shall
be a group of active participants which, except as provided below, shall not
exceed forty-five persons and shall consist of those persons eligible for
participation who shall have been designated as active participants and
notified of that fact by the Committee.&#160;
If, as a result of the growth of Abbott and its subsidiaries or changes
in Abbott&#146;s organization, the Board of Directors deems it appropriate, the
Board of Directors may, in its discretion, from time to time, increase the
number of persons who may be designated as active participants for any fiscal
year beyond the limit of forty-five persons provided for above. Selection as an
active participant for any fiscal year shall not confer upon any person a right
to be an active participant in any subsequent fiscal year, nor shall it confer
upon him the right to receive any allocation under the Plan, other than amounts
allocated to him by the Committee pursuant to the Plan, and all such
allocations shall be subject to all of the terms and conditions of the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">INACTIVE PARTICIPANTS. Inactive participants shall
consist of those persons, including beneficiaries of deceased participants, if
any, for whom an allocation shall have been made for a prior fiscal year under
this Plan or a Predecessor Plan, the payment of which was deferred and remains
unpaid. Status as an inactive participant shall not preclude a person from also
being an active participant during any fiscal year.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;3</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN FUND</font></b></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">BASE FOR MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN FUND. The &#147;base
earnings&#148; for determining whether any portion of consolidated net income for
any fiscal year may be allocated to the Management Incentive Plan Fund for such
year shall be that amount of consolidated net income (as defined in subsection
3.2) which is equal to 15 percent of the Abbott Common Shareholder&#146;s Equity for
such fiscal year. For this purpose, &#147;Abbott Common Shareholders&#146; Equity&#148; for
any fiscal year shall mean the Shareholders&#146; Investment, as reflected in the
consolidated balance sheet of Abbott as of the close of the next preceding
fiscal year, plus or minus such adjustments thereof as may be determined by the
Committee in order to reflect:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The existence, issuance, sale, exchange, conversion or
</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=938525,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">retirement of any securities, other than
common shares, of Abbott (whether involving preferred stock, debt, convertible
preferred stock or convertible debt securities); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The issuance or retirement of any common shares or any
changes in accounting methods or period adopted by Abbott since the close of
such next preceding fiscal year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:103.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:103.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any adjustments to be made in accordance with (a)&nbsp;and (b)&nbsp;above
in determining Abbott Common Shareholders&#146; Equity for any fiscal year shall be
determined by the Committee after consultation with Abbott&#146;s independent
auditors, and any determination made by the Committee after such consultation
shall be conclusive upon all persons.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">CONSOLIDATED NET INCOME. For the purposes of this
Plan, for any fiscal year or period, the &#147;consolidated net income&#148; shall be the
consolidated net income of Abbott and its subsidiaries, prepared in accordance
with generally accepted accounting principles, consistently applied, after
provision for any interest accrued with respect to such period on account of
deferred payments under this Plan or a Predecessor Plan, but before allowances
for any amount to be allocated to the Management Incentive Plan Fund, both net
of applicable income taxes, and after such adjustments for the following, as
may be determined by the Committee after consultation with Abbott&#146;s independent
auditors (all net of applicable income taxes):</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The exclusion of any charges for amortization or
goodwill arising out of acquisitions made for securities which, as a result of
adjustments made in determining Abbott Common Shareholders&#146; Equity pursuant to
subsection 3.1, are treated as common share equivalents; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The exclusion of any interest on debt securities which
are convertible into common shares of Abbott and which shall have been
considered as common share equivalents in determining Abbott Common Shareholders&#146;
Equity pursuant to subsection 3.1 hereof; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The deduction of any dividend requirement for
preferred shares which has not been considered as common share equivalents in
determining Common Shareholders&#146; Equity pursuant to subsection 3.1 hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the sole
discretion of the Committee there shall also be excluded in the calculation of &#147;consolidated
net income&#148; unusual gains and losses and the tax effects thereof, changes in
generally accepted accounting principles and the tax effects thereof and extraordinary
gains and losses.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">DETERMINATION OF MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN AMOUNT FOR
ANY YEAR. For each fiscal year that consolidated net income exceeds base
earnings, and as soon as practicable after ascertainment of that fact, the
Committee shall determine a tentative amount as the Management Incentive Plan
Amount for that year, which tentative amount shall not exceed the lesser of:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=880931,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">an amount which, when treated as an expense currently
deductible for income tax purposes in such year, would cause a 5 percent
reduction in such year&#146;s excess of consolidated net income over the base
earnings for such year; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">an amount which, when treated as an expense currently
deductible for income tax purposes in such year, would cause a 1-1/2 percent
reduction in such year&#146;s consolidated net income; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">an amount which equals 200 percent of the aggregate
base salaries of all active participants for such year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of the Plan &#147;base salary&#148; means the
amount of salary paid to each active participant by Abbott and its subsidiaries
for such year plus the includible portion (as described below) of any &#147;Eligible
Restricted Stock Award,&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;5-2 of the Abbott
Laboratories Supplemental Pension Plan and does not include bonuses, other
awards or any other compensation of any kind. The includible portion of a
participant&#146;s Eligible Restricted Stock Award shall be the portion of the
participant&#146;s Eligible Restricted Stock Award that is included in the
participant&#146;s final earnings under the Abbott Laboratories Supplemental Pension
Plan for such year. Following determination of such tentative Management
Incentive Plan Amount, the Committee shall report in writing the amount of such
tentative amount to the Board of Directors. At the meeting of the Board of
Directors coincident with or next following receipt by it of the Committee&#146;s
determination, the Board of Directors shall have the power to approve or
reduce, but not to increase, the tentative amount reported to it by the
Committee. The amount approved by the Board of Directors shall be the
Management Incentive Plan Amount for such year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">THE MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN FUND. The Management
Incentive Plan Fund at any time shall consist of an amount equal to the
aggregate of the Management Incentive Plan Amounts established pursuant to
subsection 3.3 of this Plan for all fiscal years during which this Plan shall
have been operative, plus the amounts established as Management Incentive Plan
Amounts for any prior fiscal year pursuant to a Predecessor Plan, reduced by an
amount equal to the aggregate of the amounts of awards which shall have been
allocated to participants in accordance with this Plan or a Predecessor Plan,
and awards, or any other compensation of any kind.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;4</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ALLOCATION OF MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE FUND</font></b></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ANNUAL ALLOCATION OF MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE FUND. As
soon as practicable after the close of each fiscal year, part or all of the
amount then in the Management Incentive Plan Fund (including the Management
Incentive Plan Amount for such fiscal year) will be allocated by the Committee
among active participants in the Plan for such fiscal year, having due regard
for the purposes for which the Plan was established, in the following manner
and order:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=259841,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">First, if the Chairman of the Board of Abbott shall be
an active participant for such year, the members of the Committee, other than
the Chairman of the Board, shall determine the amount, if any, to be allocated
to the Chairman of the Board from such Fund for such year; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Next, all or a part of the balance of such Fund may be
allocated among the active participants (other than the Chairman of the Board)
for such year, in such amounts and proportions as the Committee shall determine
provided, however, that the amount allocated to any active participant for any
year shall not exceed 200 percent of such participant&#146;s base salary for that
year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">COMMITTEE&#146;S DISCRETION IN ALLOCATIONS. In making any
allocations in accordance with subsection 4.1 for any year, the discretion of
the Committee shall be absolute, and no active participants for any year, by
reason of their designation as such, shall be entitled to any particular
amounts or any amount whatsoever.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;5</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PAYMENT OF AMOUNTS ALLOCATED TO PARTICIPANTS</font></b></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">TIME OF PAYMENT. For fiscal years beginning after December&nbsp;31,
1988, a participant shall direct the payment or deferral of an allocation made
to him pursuant to subsection 4.1 at the time specified in subsection 5.2
(subject to such conditions relating to the right of the participant to receive
payment of such amount as established by the Committee) by one or more of the
following methods:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">current payment in cash to the participant, which
payment shall be made no later than the last day of the &#147;applicable 2 &#189; month
period&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">current payment of a portion in cash and deposited to
a grantor trust (the &#147;Grantor Trust&#148;) established by the participant (in a form
which the Committee determines is substantially similar to the trust in Exhibit&nbsp;B)
and the balance paid to the participant approximately equal to the participant&#146;s
aggregate federal, state and local individual income and employment taxes
(determined in accordance with subsection 6.7); provided that all payments or
contributions to the Grantor Trust and participant contemplated by this
subsection 5.1(b)&nbsp;shall be made no later than the last day of the &#147;applicable
2 &#189; month period&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation
&#167;&nbsp;1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A); or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">deferral of payment until such time and in such manner
as determined in accordance with subsection 5.14.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">TIME OF ELECTION.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A participant must make the election
described in subsection 5.1 by filing it with the Committee or its delegate on
or before December&nbsp;31 </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=192220,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">of the year prior to the fiscal year during which the incentive compensation is
earned under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding the timing
requirements described above, an individual who newly becomes eligible to
participate in the Plan by being designated as a participant under subsection
2.1 (and who was not eligible to participate in any other plan that would be
aggregated with the Plan under Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(c)) may make the
an initial deferral election described in subsection 5.1 by filing it with the
Committee or its delegate within the thirty (30) day period immediately
following the date he or she first is designated as participant, <u>provided</u>,
that the compensation deferred pursuant to such election relates solely to services
performed after the date of such election.&#160;
For this purpose, an election shall be deemed to apply to compensation
paid for services performed after the election if the election applies to no
more than the amount prescribed by Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-2(a)(7)(i).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any election described in subsection
5.1 shall be irrevocable for the fiscal year to which the election applies.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">SEPARATE ACCOUNTS. The Committee shall establish
accounts for participants who have made elections pursuant to subsection 5.1(b)&nbsp;or
5.1(c)&nbsp;as follows.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Committee will maintain a &#147;Deferred Account&#148; in
the name of each participant who has elected to defer payment of all or a
portion of his or her MIP award under subsection 5.1(c).&#160; The Deferred Account shall consist of
allocations deferred according to subsection 5.1(c)&nbsp;and any adjustments
made in accordance with subsection 5.4.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Committee will maintain two separate Accounts, a &#147;Pre-Tax
Account&#148; and an &#147;After-Tax Account&#148;, in the name of each participant who has
elected to have a portion of his or her MIP award deposited in cash to a
Grantor Trust according to subsection 5.1(b).&#160;
The Pre-Tax Account shall consist of the aggregate of all allocations
contemplated by subsection 5.1(b), whether deposited to the participant&#146;s
Grantor Trust or made in cash to the participant, and any adjustments made in
accordance with subsection 5.5.&#160; The
After-Tax Account shall consist of allocations deposited to the participant&#146;s
Grantor Trust in cash according to subsection 5.1(b)&nbsp;and any adjustments
made in accordance with subsection 5.6.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ADJUSTMENT OF DEFERRED ACCOUNTS. As of the end of each
fiscal year, each participant&#146;s Deferred Account shall be adjusted by the
Committee as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FIRST, reduced by an amount equal to
any distributions made to the participant during that year pursuant to
subsections 5.14 or 5.15;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">NEXT, increased by an amount equal
to the allocation for that year that is deferred pursuant to subsection 5.1(c);
and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=215295,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FINALLY, increased by an amount
equal to the interest earned for that year according to subsection 5.7.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ADJUSTMENT OF PRE-TAX ACCOUNTS. As of the end of each
fiscal year, each participant&#146;s Pre-Tax Account shall be adjusted by the
Committee as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FIRST, reduced, in any year in which the participant is
entitled to receive a distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, by an amount
equal to the distribution that would have been made to the participant if the
aggregate amounts allocated according to subsection 5.1(b)&nbsp;had instead
been deferred under subsection 5.1(c);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">NEXT, increased by an amount equal to any allocation
for that year that is paid to the participant (including the amount deposited
in the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust) according to subsection 5.1(b); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FINALLY, increased by an amount equal to the interest
earned for that year according to subsection 5.7.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ADJUSTMENT OF AFTER-TAX ACCOUNTS. As of the end of
each fiscal year, each participant&#146;s After-Tax Account shall be adjusted by the
Committee as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FIRST, reduced, in any year in which the participant
is in receipt of a benefit distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, by an
amount calculated as provided in subsection 5.19 which represents the
distribution for such year;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">NEXT, increased by an amount equal to the allocation
for that year that is deposited in the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust according to
subsection 5.1(b); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FINALLY, increased by an amount equal to the interest
earned for that year according to subsection 5.7.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.7</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">INTEREST ACCRUALS ON ACCOUNTS.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">As of the end of each fiscal year, a participant&#146;s Deferred
Account or Pre-Tax Account, as applicable, shall be credited with interest (&#147;Interest&#148;)
at the following rate:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the average of the &#147;prime rate&#148; of
interest published by the Wall Street Journal (Mid-West Edition) or comparable
successor quotation service on the first business day of January&nbsp;and the
last business day of each month of the fiscal year;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="5",CHK=1017020,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KQ-01_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Jan 21 13:27 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">plus two hundred twenty-five (225)
basis points.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">As of the end of each fiscal year, a participant&#146;s
After-Tax Account shall be credited with the amount of Interest provided above,
multiplied by the aggregate of the federal, state and local individual income
tax rates determined in accordance with subsection 6.7 (the &#147;After-Tax Interest&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">This Interest and After-Tax Interest, as applicable,
shall be credited on the conditions established by the Committee, provided that
any award allocation shall be considered to have been made and credited to a
participant&#146;s Account as of the first day of the fiscal year in which the award
is made.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.8</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">GUARANTEED RATE PAYMENTS. In addition to any
allocation made to a participant for any fiscal year in accordance with
subsection 5.1(b), Abbott shall also make a payment to a participant&#146;s Grantor
Trust (a &#147;Guaranteed Rate Payment&#148;) for each year in which the Grantor Trust is
in effect.&#160; The Guaranteed Rate Payment
shall equal the excess, if any, of the participant&#146;s Net Interest Accrual (as
defined below) over the net earnings of the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust for the
year and shall be paid within the thirty (30) days beginning April&nbsp;1 of
the following fiscal year.&#160; A participant&#146;s
Net Interest Accrual for the year is an amount equal to the After-Tax Interest
credited to the participant&#146;s After-Tax Account for that year in accordance
with subsection 5.7.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.9</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">GRANTOR TRUST ASSETS. Each participant&#146;s Grantor Trust
assets shall be invested solely in the instruments specified by investment
guidelines established by the Committee.&#160;
Such investment guidelines, once established, may be changed by the
Committee, provided that any change shall not take effect until the year
following the year in which the change is made and provided further that the
instruments specified shall be consistent with the provisions of subsection 3(b)&nbsp;of
the form of Grantor Trust attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;B.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.10</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">DESIGNATION OF BENEFICIARIES. Subject to the
conditions and limitations set forth below, each participant, and after a
participant&#146;s death, each primary beneficiary designated by a participant in
accordance with the provisions of this subsection 5.10, shall have the right
from time to time to designate a primary beneficiary or beneficiaries and,
successive or contingent beneficiary or beneficiaries to receive unpaid amounts
from the participant&#146;s Deferred Account under the Plan and the Predecessor
Plans. Beneficiaries may be a natural person or persons or a fiduciary, such as
a trustee of a trust or the legal representative of an estate. Any such
designation shall take effect upon the death of the participant or such
beneficiary, as the case may be, or in the case of any fiduciary beneficiary,
upon the termination of all of its duties (other than the duty to dispose of
the right to receive amounts remaining to be paid under the Plan or a
Predecessor Plan). The conditions and limitations relating to the designation
of beneficiaries are as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A nonfiduciary beneficiary shall have the right to
designate a further beneficiary or beneficiaries only if the original
participant or the next preceding</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
