<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.7
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>a2188623zex-10_7.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.7
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.7</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Amended
effective 1/1/08</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1998 ABBOTT LABORATORIES PERFORMANCE
INCENTIVE PLAN</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ESTABLISHMENT
AND PURPOSES</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ESTABLISHMENT OF THE PLAN.&#160; Abbott Laboratories (&#147;Abbott&#148;) established
the &#147;1998 Abbott Laboratories Performance Incentive Plan&#148; (the &#147;Plan&#148;), as set
forth in this document.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Plan became effective as of January&nbsp;1,
1998 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) with the approval of Abbott&#146;s shareholders at the
1998 Annual Meeting of the Shareholders, and shall remain in effect as provided
in Section&nbsp;6.1 hereof.&#160; The Plan was
amended and restated for documentary compliance with Section&nbsp;409A of the
Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, (the &#147;Code&#148;) as of January&nbsp;1,
2008.&#160; Notwithstanding anything in the
Plan to the contrary, any amounts under the Plan that were earned and vested
before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (as determined in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;409A)
with respect to participants who retired before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (&#147;Grandfathered
Amounts&#148;) shall be subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan as
administered and as in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#160; Amendments made to the Plan pursuant to this
amendment and restatement or otherwise shall not affect the Grandfathered
Amounts unless expressly provided for in the amendment.&#160; The terms and conditions applicable to the
Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;A attached hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">PURPOSES OF THE PLAN.&#160; The purposes of the Plan are to:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Prove flexibility to Abbott in its
ability to attract, motivate, and retain the services of participants in the
Plan (&#147;Participants&#148;) who make significant contributions to Abbott&#146;s success
and to allow Participants to share in the success of Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Optimize the profitability and
growth of Abbott through incentives which are consistent with Abbott&#146;s goals
and which link the performance objectives of Participants to those of Abbott&#146;s
shareholders; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Provide Participants with an
incentive for excellence in individual performance.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ADMINISTRATION</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">GENERAL.&#160; The Plan shall be administered by the
Compensation Committee (the &#147;Committee&#148;) appointed by the Board of Directors of
Abbott (the &#147;Board&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">AUTHORITY OF THE COMMITTEE.&#160; The Committee will have full authority to
administer the Plan, including the authority to interpret and construe any
provision of the Plan, and all rules, regulations and interpretations shall be
conclusive and binding on all persons.&#160;
The Committee has sole responsibility for selecting Participants,
establishing performance objectives, setting award targets, and determining
award amounts.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">DELEGATION BY THE COMMITTEE.&#160; The Committee from time to time may delegate
the performance of certain ministerial functions in connection with the Plan,
such as the</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="7",CHK=164270,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KY_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">keeping
of records, to such person or persons as the Committee may select.&#160; The cost of administration of the Plan will
be paid by Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>ELIGIBILITY
AND PARTICIPATION</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">ELIGIBILITY AND PARTICIPATION.&#160; Eligibility for participation in the Plan
shall be limited to senior officers of Abbott and its subsidiaries.
Participants in the Plan will be determined annually by the Committee from
those senior officers eligible to participate in the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>PERFORMANCE
OBJECTIVES</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES.&#160; The Plan&#146;s performance objectives (the &#147;Performance
Objectives&#148;) shall be determined with reference to Abbott&#146;s consolidated net
earnings prepared in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">INDIVIDUAL BASE AWARD ALLOCATION--DEFINED.&#160; The base award allocation for the Chief
Executive Officer, if a Participant for such fiscal year, shall be .0015 of the
consolidated net earnings of Abbott for that fiscal year.&#160; The base award allocation for the Chief
Operating Officer, if a Participant for such fiscal year, shall be .0010 of the
consolidated net earnings of Abbott for that fiscal year.&#160; The base award allocation for any other
Participant shall be .00075 of the consolidated net earnings of Abbott for that
fiscal year.&#160; Each such base award will
be increased by interest, at prevailing market rates, accrued on awards
deferred or paid to grantor trusts.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>FINAL
AWARDS</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">FINAL AWARD ALLOCATION.&#160; As soon as practical after the close of each
fiscal year, a Participant&#146;s final award allocation will be determined solely
on the basis of the Performance Objectives.&#160;
In determining a Participant&#146;s final award allocation, the Committee
will have the discretion to reduce but not increase a Participant&#146;s base award
allocation (as increased by the last sentence of Section&nbsp;4.2), provided
that a Participant&#146;s individual performance will be considered by the Committee
in exercising that discretion.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">PAYMENT OF AWARDS.&#160; A Participant&#146;s final award allocation will
be paid or deferred in accordance with rules&nbsp;adopted by the Committee
which, with respect to amounts other than Grandfathered Amounts, comply with
the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
amended.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>DURATION,
AMENDMENT, AND TERMINATION</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">DURATION OF THE PLAN.&#160; The Plan shall commence on the Effective
Date, as described in Section&nbsp;1.1 hereof, and shall remain in effect until
terminated by the Board.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION.&#160; The Board, in its sole discretion, may modify
or amend any or all of the provisions of the Plan at any time and, without
notice, may suspend or terminate it entirely.&#160;
However, no such modification may, without the consent of the</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="7",CHK=654142,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KY_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Participant,
reduce the right of a Participant to a payment or distribution to which the
Participant is entitled by reason of an outstanding award allocation.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SUCCESSORS</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">OBLIGATIONS.&#160; All obligations of Abbott under the Plan with
respect to awards granted hereunder shall be binding on any successor to
Abbott, whether the existence of such successor is the result of a direct or
indirect purchase, merger, consolidation, or otherwise, of all or substantially
all of the business and/or assets of Abbott.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="7",CHK=688893,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-KY_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 23:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit A</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1998 ABBOTT LABORATORIES PERFORMANCE INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[1998 Abbott Laboratories
Performance Incentive Plan, as filed as Exhibit 10.1 to the Abbott Laboratories
Quarterly Report for the quarter ended March 31, 1998 on Form 10-Q; and, Rules
for the 1998 Abbott Laboratories Performance Incentive Plan, as filed as
Exhibit 10.17 to the 2004 Abbott Laboratories Annual Report on Form 10-K.]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.8
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.8</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As Amended and Restated</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2008</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1998 PERFORMANCE INCENTIVE PLAN (PIP) RULES</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">409A DOCUMENT</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following rules&nbsp;shall govern the administration of the 1998
Abbott Laboratories Performance Incentive Plan (PIP) and any comparable
successor plan with respect to all amounts that are not Grandfathered Amounts.&#160; Capitalized terms used but not otherwise
defined in these Rules&nbsp;shall have the meaning provided in the PIP.&#160; These rules&nbsp;shall remain in effect until
amended by the Committee:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Fiscal Year</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The term &#147;fiscal year&#148;, as used in the PIP, means the fiscal period from
time to time employed by Abbott for the purpose of reporting earnings to
shareholders.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Consolidated Net Income</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
&#147;Consolidated Net Income&#148; shall be the consolidated net income for such
fiscal year as stated in Abbott&#146;s Audited Financial Statements.&#160; Excluded from the calculation of consolidated
net income will be the effect of changes in GAAP and the tax effects thereon,
and extraordinary gains and loses and the tax effects thereon if presented in
the audited Consolidated Statement of Earnings.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Naming of Participants</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
For any fiscal year, all participants in the PIP must be named by the Committee
prior to the completion of the immediately preceding fiscal year.&#160; A PIP participant may not be an active
participant in the MIP in the same fiscal year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Inclusion in Pensionable Earnings</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The full amount of any PIP award earned under Rule&nbsp;5 will be
included in the participant&#146;s pensionable earnings.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Time of Payment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Beginning with any award allocation paid after December&nbsp;31, 1998, a
participant must direct payment or deferral of an allocation made to the participant
under the PIP by one or more of the following methods:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In cash to the participant, which
payment shall be made no later than the last day of the &#147;applicable 2 &#189; month
period&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation
&#167;&nbsp;1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A portion in cash and deposited to a
grantor trust (the &#147;Grantor Trust&#148;) established by the participant (in a form
which the Committee determines is substantially similar to the trust in Exhibit&nbsp;A)
and the balance paid to the participant approximately equal to the participant&#146;s
aggregate federal, state and local individual income and employment taxes;
provided that all payments or contributions </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="8",CHK=860065,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-LA_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 13:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 47.5pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">to the Grantor Trust and
participant contemplated by this Section&nbsp;5(b)&nbsp;shall be made no later
than the last day of the &#147;applicable 2 &#189; month period&#148;, as such term is defined
in Treasury Regulation &#167;&nbsp;1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A); or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferral of payment until the time,
and in the manner determined in Rule&nbsp;17.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts paid under the PIP will
not be considered amounts paid under the MIP for purposes of subsections 3.3
and 3.4 and Section&nbsp;4 of the MIP.&#160;
The base salaries of PIP participants will not be considered for
determination of the MIP amount in subsection 3.3 of the MIP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;text-indent:-23.75pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Time of Election</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A participant must make the election
described in Rule&nbsp;5 by filing it with the Committee before expiration of
the election period established by the Committee, which period shall end<b>  </b>no
later than December&nbsp;31 of the fiscal year prior to the year during which
the performance incentive compensation is earned under the PIP.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding the timing requirements
of Rule&nbsp;6(a), an individual who newly becomes eligible to participate in
the PIP by being designated as a participant under Section&nbsp;3.1 of the PIP
(and who was not eligible to participate in any other plan that would be
aggregated with the Plan under Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(c)) may make the
an initial deferral election described in Rule&nbsp;5 by filing it with the
Committee or its delegate within the thirty (30) day period immediately
following the date he or she first is designated as participant, <u>provided</u>,
that the compensation deferred pursuant to such election relates solely to
services performed after the date of such election.&#160; For this purpose, an election shall be deemed
to apply to compensation paid for services performed after the election if the election
applies to no more than the amount prescribed by Treasury Regulation
&#167;1.409A-2(a)(7)(i).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any election described in Rule&nbsp;5
shall be irrevocable for the fiscal year to which the election applies.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
The Committee shall establish accounts for participants who have made
elections pursuant to Rule&nbsp;5(b)&nbsp;or 5(c)&nbsp;as follows.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Committee will maintain a &#147;Deferred
Account&#148; in the name of each participant who has elected to defer payment of
all or a portion of his or her PIP award under Rule&nbsp;5(c).&#160; The Deferred Account shall consist of
allocations deferred according to Rule&nbsp;5(c)&nbsp;and any adjustments made
in accordance with Rule&nbsp;8.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="8",CHK=64373,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-LA_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 13:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Committee will maintain two separate
Accounts, a &#147;Pre-Tax Account&#148; and an &#147;After-Tax Account&#148;, in the name of each
participant who has declined to defer allocations by electing to have a portion
of his or her PIP award deposited in cash to a Grantor Trust according to Rule&nbsp;5(b).&#160; The Pre-Tax Account shall consist of the
aggregate of all allocations contemplated by Rule&nbsp;5(b), whether deposited
to the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust or made in cash to the participant, and any
adjustments made in accordance with Rule&nbsp;9.&#160; The After-Tax Account shall consist of
allocations deposited to the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust in cash according to Rule&nbsp;5(b)&nbsp;and
any adjustments made in accordance with Rule&nbsp;10.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Adjustment of Deferred Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
At the end of each fiscal year, a participant&#146;s Deferred Account will be
adjusted as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">First, reduced by an amount equal to
any distribution made to the participant during the year according to Rule&nbsp;17
or Rule&nbsp;18;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Next, increased by an amount equal
to any allocation for that year that is deferred according to Rule&nbsp;5(c);
and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Last, increased by an amount equal
to the interest earned for that year according to Rule&nbsp;11.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Adjustment of Pre-Tax Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
At the end of each fiscal year, a participant&#146;s Pre-Tax Account will be
adjusted as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">First, reduced, in any year in which
the participant is entitled to receive a distribution from his or her Grantor
Trust, by an amount equal to the distribution that would have been made to the
participant if the aggregate amounts allocated according to Rule&nbsp;5(b)&nbsp;had
instead been deferred under Rule&nbsp;5(c);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Next, increased by an amount equal
to any allocation for that year that is paid to the participant (including the
amount paid to the participant&#146;s Grantor Trust) according to Rule&nbsp;5(b);
and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Last, increased by an amount equal
to the interest earned for that year according to Rule&nbsp;11.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Adjustment of After-Tax Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
At the end of each fiscal year, a participant&#146;s After-Tax Account will
be adjusted as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">First, reduced, in any year in which
the participant is in receipt of a distribution from his or her Grantor Trust,
by an amount calculated as provided in Rule&nbsp;28 which represents the
distribution for such year;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="8",CHK=933697,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-LA_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 13:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Next, increased by an amount equal
to the allocation for that year that is deposited in the participant&#146;s Grantor
Trust according to Rule&nbsp;5(b); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Last, increased by an amount equal
to the interest earned for that year according to Rule&nbsp;11.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Interest Accruals on Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">As of the end of each fiscal year, a
participant&#146;s Deferred Account or Pre-Tax Account, as applicable, shall be
credited with interest (&#147;Interest&#148;) at the following rate:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the average of the &#147;prime rate&#148; of
interest &#160;published by The Wall Street
Journal (Mid-West Edition) or comparable successor quotation service on the
first business day of January&nbsp;and the last business day of each month of
the fiscal year; plus</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">two hundred twenty-five (225) basis
points.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">As of the end of each fiscal year, a
participant&#146;s After-Tax Account shall be credited with the amount of Interest
set forth above, multiplied by the aggregate of the federal, state and local
individual income tax rates determined in accordance with Rule&nbsp;26 (the &#147;After-Tax
Interest&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Interest and After-Tax Interest,
as applicable, shall be credited on the conditions established by the
Committee, provided that any award allocation shall be considered to have been
made and credited to a participant&#146;s Account as of the first day of the fiscal
year in which the award is made.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Guaranteed Rate Payments</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
In addition to any allocation made to a participant for any fiscal year
in accordance with Rule&nbsp;5(b), Abbott shall also make a payment to a
participant&#146;s Grantor Trust (a &#147;Guaranteed Rate Payment&#148;) for each year in
which the Grantor Trust is in effect.&#160; The
Guaranteed Rate Payment shall equal the excess, if any, of the participant&#146;s
Net Interest Accrual (as defined below) over the net earnings of the
participant&#146;s Grantor Trust for the year, and shall be paid within the thirty (30)
days beginning April&nbsp;1 of the following fiscal year.&#160; A participant&#146;s Net Interest Accrual for a
year is an amount equal to the After-Tax Interest credited to the participant&#146;s
After-Tax Account for that year in accordance with Rule&nbsp;11(b).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">13.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Grantor Trust Assets</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Each participant&#146;s Grantor Trust assets shall be invested solely in the
instruments specified by investment guidelines established by the
Committee.&#160; Such investment guidelines,
once established, may be changed by the Committee, provided that any change
shall not take effect until the year following the year in which the change is
made and provided further that the instruments </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="8",CHK=769588,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-LA_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 13:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">specified
shall be consistent with the provisions of Section&nbsp;3(b)&nbsp;of the form
of Grantor Trust attached hereto as Attachment A.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">14.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Designation of Beneficiaries</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Subject to the conditions and limitations set forth below, each
participant, and after a participant&#146;s death, each primary beneficiary designated
by a participant in accordance with the provisions of this Rule&nbsp;14, shall
have the right from time to time to designate a primary beneficiary or
beneficiaries and, successive or contingent beneficiary or beneficiaries to
receive unpaid amounts from the participant&#146;s Deferred Account under the
PIP.&#160; Beneficiaries may be a natural
person or persons or a fiduciary, such as a trustee of a trust or the legal
representative of an estate.&#160; Any such
designation shall take effect upon the death of the participant or such
beneficiary, as the case may be, or in the case of any fiduciary beneficiary,
upon the termination of all of its duties (other than the duty to dispose of
the right to receive amounts remaining to be paid under the PIP).&#160; The conditions and limitations relating to
the designation of beneficiaries are as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A nonfiduciary beneficiary shall
have the right to designate a further beneficiary or beneficiaries only if the
original participant or the next preceding primary beneficiary, as the case may
be, shall have expressly so provided in writing; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">A fiduciary beneficiary shall
designate as a further beneficiary or beneficiaries only those persons or other
fiduciaries that are entitled to receive the amounts payable from the
participant&#146;s account under the trust or estate of which it is a fiduciary.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 48.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any beneficiary designation or grant of any power to any beneficiary
under this Rule&nbsp;14 may be exercised only by an instrument in writing,
executed by the person making the designation or granting such power and filed
with the Secretary of Abbott during the person&#146;s lifetime or prior to the
termination of a fiduciary&#146;s duties.&#160; If
a deceased participant or a deceased nonfiduciary beneficiary who had the right
to designate a beneficiary as provided above dies without having designated a
further beneficiary, or if no beneficiary designated as provided above is
living or qualified and acting, the Committee, in its discretion, may direct
distribution of the amount remaining from time to time to either: (i)&nbsp; any
one or more or all of the next of kin (including the surviving spouse) of the
participant or the deceased beneficiary, as the case may be, and in such
proportions as the Committee determines; or (ii)&nbsp; the legal representative
of the estate of the deceased participant or deceased beneficiary as the case
may be.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">15.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Non-assignability and Facility of
Payment</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Amounts payable to participants and their
beneficiaries under the PIP are not in any way subject to their debts and other
obligations, and may not be voluntarily or involuntarily sold, transferred or assigned;
provided that the provisions of these Rules&nbsp;shall not be construed as
restricting </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2188623",CP="ABBOTT LABORATORIES",DN="8",CHK=276757,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDH2.08ZDH73602]26736-2-LA_ZDH73602.CHC",USER="ABALACO",CD='Feb 20 13:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">in any way a
designation right granted to a beneficiary under Rule&nbsp;14.&#160; When a participant or the beneficiary of a
participant is under legal disability, or in the Committee&#146;s opinion is in any
way incapacitated so as to be unable to manage his or her financial affairs,
the Committee may direct that payments shall be made to the participant&#146;s or
beneficiary&#146;s legal representative, or to a relative or friend of the
participant or beneficiary for the benefit of the participant or beneficiary,
or the Committee may direct the payment or distribution for the benefit of the
participant or beneficiary in any manner that the Committee determines.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">16.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Payer of Amounts Allocated to
Participants</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Any amount allocated to a participant in the
PIP and any interest credited thereto will be paid by the employer (or such
employer&#146;s successor) by whom the participant was employed during the fiscal
year for which any amount was allocated, and for that purpose, if a participant
shall have been employed by two or more employers during any fiscal year the
amount allocated under the PIP for that year shall be an obligation of each of
the respective employers in proportion to the respective amounts of base salary
paid by each of them in that fiscal year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">17.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Manner of Payment of Deferred
Accounts</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Subject to Rule&nbsp;18, a participant shall
elect to receive payment of his Deferred Account in substantially equal annual
installments over a minimum period of ten years, or a longer period, at the
time of his deferral election under Rule&nbsp;5.&#160; Payment of a participant&#146;s Deferred Account
shall commence on the first business day of January&nbsp;of the year following
the year in which the participant incurs a termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">18.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Payment Upon Termination Following
Change in Control</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Notwithstanding any other provision of the
PIP or the provisions of any award made under the PIP, if a participant incurs
a termination of employment with Abbott and its subsidiaries for any reason within
two (2)&nbsp;years following the date of a Change in Control, provided that the
event constituting a Change in Control is also a &#147;change in control event&#148;, as
such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.409A-3(i)(5): (a)&nbsp;with
respect to a participant whose allocations under the PIP are deferred in
accordance with Section&nbsp;5(c), the aggregate unpaid balance of the
participant&#146;s Deferred Account shall be paid to such participant in a lump sum
within thirty (30) days following the date of such termination of employment,
and (b)&nbsp;with respect to a participant whose allocations under the PIP are
made pursuant to Section&nbsp;5(b), (i)&nbsp;the aggregate of the participant&#146;s
unpaid allocation under Section&nbsp;5(b)&nbsp;(if any) for the fiscal year in
which the termination occurs and (ii)&nbsp;a pro rata portion of the unpaid Guaranteed
Rate Payment under Rule&nbsp;12 attributable to the portion of the year elapsed
prior to the date of termination, shall be paid to such participant&#146;s Grantor
Trust in a lump sum within thirty (30) days following the date of such
termination of employment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.0pt;text-indent:-24.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">19.</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Change in Control</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
A &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred on the earliest
of the following dates:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
